When you use a rod, staff, or wand, you have a 15% chance to retain essence and not expend a charge and can produce an Enchant Armor or Enchant Weapons effect a total of ten times per rest. (Activate this artificer ability to increase the Enhancement Bonus of your target's currently equipped weapons or shields by 1, or to increase the Enhancement Bonus of your target's currently equipped armor by 1. An item can have only one temporary item enchantment at a time.)

Feat.Name: Past Life: Student of the Sword
Feat.Description: You recall more about your past life as a fighter. You have +2 to your Intimidate skill, +1 to the Maximum Dexterity Bonus of armor and shields and can remember your martial prowess three times per rest, increasing your base attack bonus to your level and granting +4 to hit.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Warrior of the Wild
Feat.Description: You recall more about your past life as a ranger. You have +2 to your Spot skill and can produce a Barkskin effect three times per rest. (Activate this ranger ability to toughen the skin of an ally, giving a +2 natural armor bonus to AC with an additional +1 bonus for every 3 caster levels above 3rd, to a maximum of +5 at caster level 12th.)

Feat.Name: Path of Harmonious Balance: Fists of Light
Feat.Description: You have chosen to follow the path of light. You seek to be at harmony with the world and your training will reflect your philosophy. You can activate this ability to channel positive energy into your attack, dealing 4 to 24 additional damage against undead and applying a healing shield to your target which heals your allies that strike your target. On a vorpal strike (natural 20 followed by critical confirmation), you deal an additional 1 to 50 positive energy damage to undead. D&D Dice: Activate this ability to deal 4d6 additional damage to undead plus another 1d50 to undead on vorpal.

Feat.Name: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness
Feat.Description: You have chosen to follow the path of darkness. You seek to dominate the world and your training will reflect your philosophy. You can activate this ability to channel negative energy into your attack, dealing 2 to 20 additional damage against living creatures and then rendering the target shaken. (A successful DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom Mod Will save negate the shaken effect.) On a vorpal strike (Natural 20 followed by critical confirmation), you deal an additional 1 to 50 negative energy damage. D&D Dice: Activate this ability to deal 2d10 additional damage to living creatures plus another 1d50 damage on vorpal.

DC.Name: Path of Inevitable Dominion: Fists of Darkness
DC.Description: You can activate this ability to channel negative energy into your attack, dealing 2 to 20 additional damage against living creatures and then rendering the target shaken.(A successful Will save negate the shaken effect.

Feat.Name: Perfect Self
Feat.Description: You have transcended your former race and are now considered a Lawful Outsider. You have gained damage reduction 10/Epic. Warforged retain most living construct traits.

Feat.Name: Point Blank Shot
Feat.Description: You gain a +1 bonus to hit with ranged attacks within 15 meters, and your ranged weapons deal +1[W]. (A weapon that deals 1d6 damage per hit will deal 2d6 damage per hit instead, while a weapon that deals 2d8 damage per hit will deal 4d8 damage instead. This affects the base dice associated with a weapon any time they are rolled, including critical hits.) While wielding Longbows and Shortbows, you gain +1 Critical Threat Range.

Feat.Name: Poison Save Bonus
Feat.Description: Dwarves are naturally resistant to poison, receiving a +2 bonus to saves against poisons.

Feat.Name: Power Attack
Feat.Description: Reduces your hit bonus by 5, or your Base Attack Bonus, whichever is lower. Then your successful attacks will have their damage increased by the same amount. Two-handed weapons get twice that damage bonus.

Stance.Name: Power Attack
Stance.Description: Reduces your hit bonus by 5, or your Base Attack Bonus, whichever is lower. Then your successful attacks will have their damage increased by the same amount. Two-handed weapons get twice that damage bonus.

Feat.Name: Power Critical
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to confirm critical hits and a +2 bonus to critical hit damage (before multipliers are applied).

Feat.Name: Precise Shot
Feat.Description: Your missile attacks may pass through other characters and monsters to strike their target. This feat also grants you the Offensive Ranged Stance 'Archer's Focus', which lets you deal progressively more damage with ranged attacks while standing still. +5 Ranged Power per stack, Max stacks: 15 or 25 with Deepwood Stalker enhancement

Stance.Name: Archer's Focus
Stance.Description: Archer's Focus lets you deal progressively more damage with ranged attacks while standing still. +5 Ranged Power per stack, Max stacks: 15 or 25 wih Deepwood Stalker enhancement

Feat.Name: Precision
Feat.Description: While using Precision mode, you gain +5% to hit and reduces the target's fortification against your attacks by 25%.

Stance.Name: Precision
Stance.Description: While using Precision mode, you gain +5% to hit and reduces the target's fortification against your attacks by 25%.

Feat.Name: Purity of Body
Feat.Description: You have gained control over your body's immune system and are now unaffected by all natural diseases. (This has no effect on magical or supernatural diseases.)

Feat.Name: Quick Draw
Feat.Description: Allows the character to switch weapons and armor faster than they would normally be able to. It also increases the rate of fire of thrown weapons, but not of other ranged weapons.

Feat.Name: Quicken Spell
Feat.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, spells cast twice as fast and cannot be interrupted by enemy attacks, but they consume 10 additional spell points.

Stance.Name: Quicken
Stance.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, spells cast twice as fast and cannot be interrupted by enemy attacks, but they consume 10 additional spell points.

Feat.Name: Quivering Palm
Feat.Description: The Monk delivers a fatal attack by sending waves of vibrations through the target with a weapon strike. The attack costs 30 Ki, and if it hits the victim must pass a Fortitude save (DC 10 + Monk level + Max[Dex, Wis] modifier + Assassinate bonuses) or die. Quivering Palm gains DC bonuses from general tactical combat boosts, but not Sundering items. Whenever an enemy saves vs. Quivering Palm, you get a stacking +2 bonus to your Quivering Palm DC. This stack is dispelled when you successfully kill someone with Quivering Palm (or 3 minutes pass). This ability emulates other death spells, so deathblock or death ward both grant immunity. Using Quivering Palm will drop you out of Sneak and remove any Invisibility effects.

DC.Name: Quivering Palm
DC.Description: The monk delivers a fatal attack by sending waves of vibrations through the target with a weapon strike. The attack costs 30 Ki, and if it hits the victim must pass a Fortitude save or die.

Feat.Name: Racial Spell Resistance
Feat.Description: You are naturally resistance to spells and magical effects. You have a base Spell Resistance of 6, protecting you from many non-damaging spells and effects.

Feat.Name: Rage
Feat.Description: Activate this barbarian ability to enter a bloodthirsty frenzy, granting you a +4 bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +2 Morale bonus to Will saves and a -2 penalty to AC. When the rage ends, however, you will lose the hit points granted to you by increased Constitution and become fatigued. Your rage will list for 30 seconds plus an additional amount of time based on your constitution. You can prematurely end your rage by using the Dismiss Rage feat.

Stance.Name: Rage
Stance.Description: Enter a bloodthirsty frenzy, granting you a +4 bonus to Strength and Constitution, a +2 Morale bonus to Will saves and a -2 penalty to AC.

Feat.Name: Rapid Reload
Feat.Description: Allows Crossbows to be reloaded about 20% faster.

Feat.Name: Rapid Shot
Feat.Description: You can make ranged attacks about 20% faster and reload faster when using a ranged weapon. You gain Ranged Power equal to 1.5 your BAB with longbows and shortbows.

Feat.Name: Remove Disease
Feat.Description: Activate this Paladin ability to cure one or more diseases in your target.

Feat.Name: Resilience
Feat.Description: Defensive Combat Stance: While using Resilience mode, you gain a +4 bonus to all saves. Spells have three times their normal cooldown when this mode is active. Cannot be used while raged.

Stance.Name: Resilience
Stance.Description: You gain a +4 to all saving throws. Spells have three times their normal cooldown when this mode is active.

Feat.Name: Resist Poison
Feat.Description: Grants a +4 bonus to all saving throws versus Poison.

Feat.Name: Retain Essence
Feat.Description: When you use a rod, staff, or wand, you have a (Artificer Level + Intelligence Modifier)% chance not to expend a charge.

Feat.Name: Revive Iron Defender
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to revive your Iron Defender companion once per rest.

Feat.Name: Sap
Feat.Description:
Tactical Melee Attack: When activated, a melee special attack is made. If it hits, the victim is dazed for 18 seconds normally or 30 seconds from a successful sneak attack. (Whether or not your character can normally perform sneak attacks) or until they are damaged. Unlike Trip and Stunning Blow, no save is made against this effect
Creatures who cannot be sneak attacked will not be affected.

Feat.Name: Self Sufficient
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to the character's Heal and Repair skills.

Feat.Name: Shield Deflection
Feat.Description: When actively blocking with any type of Shield you are proficient with, you gain a Competence bonus based on the type of shield to completely ignore Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage. Buckler: 20% Small Shield: 25% Large Shield 30% Tower Shield: 40%

Feat.Name: Shield Mastery
Feat.Description: You are skilled with the use of a shield and your physical resistance is increased by 3 when using a buckler or small shield, 5 when using a large shield, or 10 when using a tower shield. You gain 3% double strike while using a shield. Add +3 Combat Style bonus to Melee Power

Feat.Name: Shield Proficiency (General)
Feat.Description: This feat negates the penalties from using bucklers, small and Large Shields.

Feat.Name: Shining Star
Feat.Description: You use the combined power of Earth, Wind and Fire to set up harmonic vibrations within your enemy that force them to dance. A successful Will save negates this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod + Stun).

DC.Name: Shining Star
DC.Description: You use the combined power of Earth, Wind and Fire to set up harmonic vibrations within your enemy that force them to dance. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Shot on the Run
Feat.Description: Negates the penalty to your attack roll for firing ranged weapon while moving. Also gives +6 ranged power.

Feat.Name: Single Weapon Fighting
Feat.Description: While Single Weapon Fighting, you gain +10% Combat Style bonus to attack speed and 2 Melee Power. Requires fighting with a single one-handed weapon, and wielding only an orb, runearm, or nothing in your off hand.

Feat.Name: Shuriken Expertise
Feat.Description: You are skilled with the use of the Shuriken and have a chance to throw an additional one per throw. (Percent chance to throw an additional Shuriken is equal to your Dexterity.)

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Club
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a club.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Dagger
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a dagger.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Dart
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a dart.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Heavy Crossbow
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a heavy crossbow.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Heavy Mace
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a heavy mace.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Light Crossbow
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a light crossbow.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Light Mace
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a light mace.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Morningstar
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a morningstar.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Quarterstaff
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a quarterstaff.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Sickle
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a sickle.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Throwing Dagger
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using a throwing dagger.

Feat.Name: Simple Weapon Proficiency: Unarmed
Feat.Description: You do not suffer a -4 penalty on attack rolls when using unarmed attacks, or when attacking from an animal form.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Balance
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Balance skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Bluff
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Bluff skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Concentration
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Concentration skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Diplomacy
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Diplomacy skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Disable Device
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Disable Device skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Haggle
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Haggle skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Heal
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Heal skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Hide
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Hide skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Intimidate
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Intimidate skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Jump
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Jump skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Listen
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Listen skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Move Silently
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Move Silently skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Open Lock
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Open Lock skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Perform
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Perform skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Repair
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Repair skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Search
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Search skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Spell Craft
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Spell Craft checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Spot
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Spot skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Swim
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Swim skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Tumble
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Tumble skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Focus: Use Magic Device
Feat.Description: Grants a +3 bonus to all Use Magic Device skill checks.

Feat.Name: Skill Mastery
Feat.Description: This ability gains +1 to all skills. A Rogue may take this ability multiple times.

Feat.Name: Slicing Blow
Feat.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you deal one point of Constitution damage to your target, and deal 1 to 6 additional damage every 2 seconds for 18 seconds. The target suffers an additional 1 to 6 damage per tick for every three Character Levels. This damage scales with 100% Melee Power, and can stack up to three times. Some creatures may be immune to the bleeding or wounding effect.

Feat.Name: Slippery Mind
Feat.Description: Grants the Rogue a second chance to avoid harmful enchantments. Upon failure of a Will Save vs. Enchantments, the rogue immediately receives a second attempt at the saving throw.

Feat.Name: Slow Fall
Feat.Description: Your focus allows you to bend nature around you to make gravity have less effect. This is an active feat and can be turned off should you desire normal gravity to affect you.

Feat.Name: Small Size Bonus
Feat.Description: As a Small creature, you receive a +1 size bonus to attack rolls and Armor Class and a +4 bonus on Hide checks. -4 penalty to Intimidate.

Feat.Name: Smite Evil
Feat.Description: Using this attack, you call on the Paladin's ability to strike down evil creatures, gaining twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll and a damage bonus based on your Paladin level. Smites return at a rate of one every 90 seconds.

Feat.Name: Smite Evil (Ranged)
Feat.Description: Using this attack, you call on the Paladin's ability to strike down evil creatures, gaining twice your Charisma bonus to your attack roll and a damage bonus based on your Paladin level. Smites return at a rate of one every 90 seconds.

Feat.Name: Snake Blood
Feat.Description: Grants a +1 bonus on Reflex saves and +2 bonus to saving throws versus Poison.

Feat.Name: Sneak
Feat.Description: The character becomes invisible to all enemies that fail a Spot and Listen skill check, opposed by Hide and Move Silently skills.

Feat.Name: Sneak Attack
Feat.Description: Allows you to deal additional damage when a monster is unaware of your presence or targeting another character.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Abjuration
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Abjuration school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Conjuration
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Conjuration school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Enchantment
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Enchantment school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Evocation
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Evocation school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Illusion
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Illusion school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Necromancy
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Necromancy school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Focus: Transmutation
Feat.Description: Your spells of the Transmutation school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Spell Penetration
Feat.Description: Adds +2 to your caster level check for defeating spell resistance.

Feat.Name: Spell Save Bonus
Feat.Description: Your race are naturally resistant to spells, receiving a +2 bonus to saves against spell effects.

Feat.Name: Spring Attack
Feat.Description: You leap forward striking a target enemy and all those around them. Requires a visible target and that you are holding a melee weapon. You suffer no penalty to your attack roll when moving and attacking. You will also gain a 2% Dodge bonus.

Feat.Name: Stealthy
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to the character's Hide and Move Silently skills.

Feat.Name: Still Mind
Feat.Description: Your training and meditation improve your resistance to mind-affecting attacks, granting you a +2 bonus on saves against enchantments.

Feat.Name: Storm Strike I
Feat.Description: You strike an opponent, backed with the power of lightning. Your attack will deal 1 to 6 additional lightning damage (D&D Dice: 1d6).

Feat.Name: Strike of the Enduring I
Feat.Description: You strike an opponent, backed with the strength of the earth. Your attack deals 4 additional damage.

Feat.Name: Stunning Blow
Feat.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you may stun the target for a few seconds. Some creatures may be immune to the stun effect. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + Str mod + Stun bonuses)

DC.Name: Stunning Blow
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you may stun the target for a few seconds. Some creatures may be immune to the stun effect. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Stunning Fist
Feat.Description: A swift unarmed attack to vulnerable areas that cause your target to be stunned for 6 seconds if it fails a Fortitude save. DC = 10 + half character levels + Wis mod + other modifiers

DC.Name: Stunning Fist
DC.Description: A swift unarmed attack to vulnerable areas that cause your target to be stunned for 6 seconds if it fails a Fortitude save.

Feat.Name: Sunder
Feat.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you may reduce the target's Armor Class by 10% and Fortification by 25% for six seconds. Some creatures may be immune to the Sunder effect. A successful Fortitude saving throw negates this effect. (DC 10 + STR mod + Sunder bonuses). Cooldown: 10 seconds.

DC.Name: Sunder
DC.Description: Tactical Melee Attack: Using this attack, you may reduce the target's Armor Class by 10% and Fortification by 25% for six seconds. A successful Fortitude saving throw negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Bludgeoning Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a bludgeoning weapon, including attacks from a druid in animal form and an additional +2 stacking Melee Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Piercing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a piercing weapon and an additional +2 stacking Melee Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Ranged Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a ranged weapon. and an additional +2 stacking Ranged Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Slashing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a slashing weapon. and an additional +2 stacking Melee Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Superior Weapon Focus: Thrown Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a thrown weapon. and an additional +2 stacking Ranged Power. This bonus stacks with the Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus feats.

Feat.Name: Tactical Combatant
Feat.Description: +4 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Tactical Mastery
Feat.Description: +6 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Tactical Supremacy
Feat.Description: +8 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Tactical Training
Feat.Description: +2 bonus to all Tactical DCs

Feat.Name: Ten Thousand Stars
Feat.Description: For the next 30 seconds, add your Wisdom ability score to your Ranged Power and add your Monk level * 5 to your Doubleshot. This ability puts Manyshot on a 30 second cooldown. Cooldown: one minute.

Feat.Name: The Gathering Storm
Feat.Description: Air:Air:Air Finisher - Winds gather about your enemy, decreasing your opponent's chance to land attacks. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod)

DC.Name: The Gathering Storm
DC.Description: Winds gather about your enemy, decreasing your opponent's chance to land attacks. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect.

Feat.Name: The Raging Sea
Feat.Description: Water:Water:Water Finisher - Like a swimmer fighting against the raging sea, your enemy finds it difficult to act with speed. This attack slows your enemies attacks. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod)

DC.Name: The Raging Sea
DC.Description: Like a swimmer fighting against the raging sea, your enemy finds it difficult to act with speed. This attack slows your enemies attacks.

Feat.Name: The Trembling Earth
Feat.Description: Earth:Earth:Earth Finisher - The force of earth is behind your attacks, increasing your critical threat multiplier for this attack by 2 and partially bewildering your foe, preventing them from casting spells. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod)

DC.Name: The Trembling Earth
DC.Description: The force of earth is behind your attacks, increasing your critical threat multiplier for this attack by 2 and partially bewildering your foe, preventing them from casting spells. A successful Fortitude save ends this effect.

Feat.Name: Touch Of Despair
Feat.Description: Dark:Dark:Dark Finisher - You strike your opponent down with a terrible curse, halving all positive energy healing done to the target, reducing its fortification by 25% and increasing its negative energy vulnerability by 25%. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect. (DC 10 + Monk Level + Wisdom mod) The target receives periodic saves to attempt to break free of this effect.

DC.Name: Touch Of Despair
DC.Description: You strike your opponent down with a terrible curse, halving all positive energy healing done to the target, reducing its fortification by 25% and increasing its negative energy vulnerability by 25%. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Timeless Body
Feat.Description: Your soul is balanced. No corrupt influences can possess your body after death - you are immune to the spawn effect of most undead.

Feat.Name: Tireless Rage
Feat.Description: Upon reaching level 17, a barbarian is no longer fatigued after raging. Also, gain a stacking +2 Strength and Constitution Bonus along with a +1 Morale Bonus to Will Saving Throws while raging.

Feat.Name: Toughness
Feat.Description: Increases your hit points by +3 at first level and 1 additional hit point for each additional level.

Feat.Name: Tower Shield Proficiency
Feat.Description: This feat negates the extra penalties from using a tower shield while untrained. The -2 attack penalty still applies.

Feat.Name: Trap Sense (Barbarian)
Feat.Description: Barbarians receive a +1 bonus to saves against traps. This bonus increases every three Barbarian levels thereafter.

Feat.Name: Trap Sense (Rogue)
Feat.Description: Rogues receive a +1 bonus to saves against traps. This bonus increases every three Rogue levels thereafter.

Feat.Name: Trap Sense (Dark Hunter)
Feat.Description: Dark Huntersreceive a +1 bonus to saves against traps. This bonus increases every three Dark Hunter levels thereafter.

Feat.Name: Trapfinding
Feat.Description: A Rogue, Artificer or Dark Hunter can detect and disable difficult traps.

Feat.Name: Trapmaking
Feat.Description: You have learned enough about traps to be able to scavenge parts from them, and with the help of the Free Agents, can craft your own.

Feat.Name: Trip
Feat.Description: Using this attack, you may trip the target, rendering it prone. Some creatures may be immune to this effect. A successful Balance check negates this effect. (DC of 10 + Strength modifier + related Enhancements + Vertigo).

DC.Name: Trip
DC.Description: Using this attack, you may trip the target, rendering it prone. Some creatures may be immune to this effect. A successful Balance check negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Turn Undead
Feat.Description: Character can turn undead (Charisma modifier +3) times per day.

DC.Name: Turn Undead
DC.Description: Attempts to drive away nearby undead or force them to cower.

Feat.Name: Two Handed Fighting
Feat.Description:
While Two-Handed Fighting: +60% Strikethrough Chance. You also gain a +2 Combat Style bonus to Melee Power while Two-Handed Fighting.
For the purpose of this feat, you are considered to be Two-Handed Fighting while using a Two-Handed Melee Weapon (not including Handwraps). You are also considered to be Two-Handed Fighting while wielding a Bastard Sword or Dwarven axe in your main hand and a Shield, Orb, Rune Arm, or Nothing in your off-hand. You are not considered to be Two-Handed Fighting while in Wild Shape. While using a Two Handed Weapon (not including Bastard Sword, Dwarven axe or Druid Animal Formas), your Ability Score bonus to damage improves by 25%.

Feat.Name: Two Weapon Defense
Feat.Description: Increases the amount of DR that blocking with two weapons or handwraps grants you. Also grants you a +1 bonus to your AC and +5 Physical Resistance as well as +10 Magical Resistance Rating Cap.

Feat.Name: Two Weapon Fighting
Feat.Description: Reduces the to-hit penalty when using two weapons at the same time. The penalty for your primary hand lessens by 2 and the one for your off-hand lessens by 6, resulting in -4/-4 (instead of -6/-10 without this feat). If the off-hand weapon is light, both penalties decrease by another 2 points, down to -2/-2 (instead of -4/-8 without this feat). Two Weapon Fighting also increases the chance to proc an off-hand attack by 20% (applies to unarmed Monk), bringing the total chance to 40%.

Effect.DisplayName: Fake effect to cause update, never displayed, as effects handled in C++ code

Feat.Name: Unarmed Strike
Feat.Description: While centered (unarmored, unencumbered and wielding monk weapons), your fists and feat are lethal weapons.

Feat.Name: Uncanny Dodge
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to gain a temporary 25% Dodge bonus and a +4 reflex save bonus for 20 seconds. This feat also grants you a 1% passive bonus to Dodge at levels 4, 6, 8, 12, 16 and 20.

Feat.Name: Unleash Iron Defender
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to summon your Iron Defender companion.

Feat.Name: Veil the Elements
Feat.Description: Elemental Form Modifer: Toggling this feat will allow you to still appear human while in elemental forms.

Feat.Name: Venom Immunity
Feat.Description: You are immune to ability score damage from natural poisons. (This has no effect on magical or supernatural poisons.)

Feat.Name: Disease Immunity
Feat.Description: You are immune to ability score damage from natural diseases. (This has no effect on magical or supernatural disease.)

Feat.Name: Walk Of The Sun
Feat.Description: Fire:Light:Fire Finisher - Activate this finisher to heighten the fire burning within the hearts of your allies, granting them bonuses to hit, skill checks and saves for a short period of time.

Feat.Name: Warforged Traits
Feat.Description: Warforged are naturally immune to sleep, energy drain, nausea, sickness, exhaustion and paralysis effects except those with physically hold them in place. You are immune to ability score damage from natural poisons and natural diseases, but are vulnerable to those that specifically affect wood or metal. You gain a +10 racial bonus to saving throws against magical poisons and do not fail saving throws against them on a roll of a natural 1 (this renders you immune to magical poisons with a DC of less than 11+your Fortitude save). If you transform into a different type of creature, you will lose these benefits until you return to your Warforged form.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Create Thrall
Feat.Description: Charm monster

Feat.Name: Warlock: Dark Delirium
Feat.Description: Plunge one enemy's mind into an illusory realm. that enemy is dazed and cannot act for 20 seconds. Each time this enemy is damaged, there's a 10% chance they break free. Does not affect bosses. There is no saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Dark One's Luck
Feat.Description: +2 to all saving throws

Feat.Name: Warlock: Celestial Attunement
Feat.Description: +5 Physical Resistance Rating, +1 to all Saving Throws

Feat.Name: Warlock: Unhallowed Flesh
Feat.Description: +5 Physical and Magical Resistance Rating

Feat.Name: Warlock: Frozen Footsteps
Feat.Description: +10% Cold Absorption

Feat.Name: Warlock: Deceive Item
Feat.Description: +5 Use Magic Device

Feat.Name: Warlock: Eldritch Blast Damage
Feat.Description: +1d8 Eldritch Blast base Damage

Feat.Name: Warlock: Eldritch Blast Focused
Feat.Description: Eldritch blast Shape: Toggle on to turn your basic attack into a ranged magical bolt dealing 1d6 force damage. This is treated as an evocation spell, and damage sales with 125% spell power. It is also affected normally by spell critical chance and spell critical damage. Gaining more warlock levels grants feats that increase this damage. This is not affected by metamagic feats, nor by melee and ranged feats. medium armor, heavy armor and shields can cause Eldritch Blast to suffer Arcane Spell Failure.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Entropic Ward
Feat.Description: +5 MRR, 25 Fortification

Feat.Name: Warlock: Hurl Through Hell
Feat.Description: Cooldown: 25 seconds. Exile one target enemy from this existence. An enemy succeeding on a Will save vs DC(15 + Warlock level + Charisma Modifier) is instead paralyzed and helpless with fear for 6 seconds.

DC.Name: Warlock: Hurl Through Hell
DC.Description: Exile one target enemy from this existence. An enemy succeeding on a Will save is instead paralyzed and helpless with fear for 6 seconds.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Misty escape
Feat.Description: You become invisible and charge forward. During your escape, you move through monsters as if you were ethereal. These effects last for six seconds

Feat.Name: Warlock: Ameliorate
Feat.Description: Attempt to obliterate an Undead, or severly weaken any non-Undead foe. Undead must succeed on a Will save vs DC(15 + Warlock level + Charisma Mod) or be destroyed. Undead who fail this save, or enemieswho are not undead, instead are terrorized and have their Magical resistance Rating reduced by 10 for 15 seconds.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Channel the Abyss
Feat.Description: Shroud yourself in the Abyss, which will grant you unholy power at a cost. You gain +2 Charisma, +10 Negative Healing Amplification, and +10 Negative Spell Power. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by Negative Energy, take 50% healing from Positive Energy, and take double damage from Light. You are considered Undead rather than your original type for the purposes of most effects.

Stance.Name: Channel the Abyss
Stance.Description: Shroud yourself in the Abyss, which will grant you unholy power at a cost. You gain +2 Charisma, +10 Negative Healing Amplification, and +10 Negative Spell Power. You have +100% critical hit resistance, are healed by Negative Energy, take 50% healing from Positive Energy, and take double damage from Light. You are considered Undead rather than your original type for the purposes of most effects.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Absolute Zero
Feat.Description: Attempt to lock a single enemy in ice - permanently. Enemies must succees on a Will save vs DC(15 + Warlock level + Charisma Mod) or be forever trapped in solid ice. Enemies made of fire will instead be destroyed with no save. Does not affecct bosses.

DC.Name: Warlock: Absolute Zero
DC.Description: Attempt to lock a single enemy in ice - permanently. Enemies must succees on a Will save vs DC(15 + Warlock level + Charisma Mod) or be forever trapped in solid ice. Enemies made of fire will instead be destroyed with no save. Does not affecct bosses.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact Damage
Feat.Description: +1d6 Eldritch Blast base Damage

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fey
Feat.Description: Your patron is a lord or lady of the fey, a creature of legend who holds secrets that were forgotten before the mortal races were born. This being's motivations are often inscrutable and sometimes whimsical and might involve a striving for greater magical power or the settling of age-old grudges. Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Obscuring Mist, 5 - Blindness, 9 - Slow, 14 - Greater Dispel Magic, 17 - Otto's Sphere of Dancing, 19 - Otto's Irresistible Dance

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fey
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fiend
Feat.Description: You have made a pact with a fiend from the lower planes of existence, a being whose aims are evil, even if you strive against those aims. Such beings desire the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you. Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses). Cannot be activated if Good. Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Command, 5 - Rage, 9 - Fire Shield, 14 - Binding Chain, 17 - Power Word: Blind, 19 - Howl of Terror

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: Fiend
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: Great Old One
Feat.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses). Can not be activated if Lawful. Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1, 5, 9, 14, 17, 19: 1 - Entangle, 5 - Knock, 9 - Phantasmal Killer, 14 - Dominate Person, 17 - Mass Suggestion, 19 - Power Word: Kill

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: Great Old One
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Acid damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: Celestial
Feat.Description:
Your patron is a divine Celestial, patron of those who wish to devote themselves to an unconventional method of worship. You will learn to channel the light and air around you into a righteous weapon, and utilize holy abilities to help your friends and pass judgement upon your enemies.
Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Electric damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Bless 5 - Soundburst 9 - Magic Circle Against Evil 14 - Prayer 17 - Holy Aura 19 - Freedom of Movement

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Sonic damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: Celestial
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Electric damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Reflex saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: The Abyss
Feat.Description:
Your patron is of the Abyss - a pit of darkness beyond comprehension, a desire and a hunger beyond meaning itself. Tread carefully.
Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Negative damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Mage Armor 5 - Spawn Screen 9 - Halt Undead 14 - Death Aura 17 - Symbol of Pain 19 - Rend the Soul

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Negative damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: The Abyss
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Negative damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Pact: The Carceri Storm
Feat.Description:
Your patron is a demonic entity from the realm of Carceri, otherwise known as Tarterus. The bitter cold and frreezing winds will chill you to your bones, but if you can master the power granted to you, great things will surely come your way...
Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Cold damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses) Adds Spells to your spell book at level 1 - Merfolk's Blessing 5 - Gust of Wind 9 - Creeping Cold 14 - Ice Storm 17 - Niac's Biting Cold 19 - Greater Creeping Cold

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Cold damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Will saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses)

DC.Name: Warlock: Pact: The Carceri Storm
DC.Description: Toggle on: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Cold damage, plus 1d6 per two Warlock levels. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw.

Feat.Name: Warlock: Paragon's Aegis
Feat.Description: +5 MRR

Feat.Name: Weapon Finesse
Feat.Description: You use your Dexterity bonus instead of Strength bonus to determine bonus to attack with certain weapons if it is higher. This feat applies to attacks made by a Dagger, Handaxe, Kama, Kukri, Light Hammer, Light Mace, Light Pick, Rapier, Short Sword, Sickle, or while unarmed or in a Druid animal form.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Bludgeoning Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a bludgeoning weapon, or when attacking from an animal form and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Piercing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a piercing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Ranged Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a ranged weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Slashing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a slashing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Focus: Thrown Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +1 bonus to attack rolls when using a thrown weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Bludgeoning Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a bludgeoning weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power. Also works in animal form.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Piercing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a piercing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Ranged Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a ranged weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Slashing Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a slashing weapon and +2 stacking Melee Power.

Feat.Name: Weapon Specialization: Thrown Weapons
Feat.Description: Provides a +2 bonus to damage rolls when using a thrown weapon and +2 stacking Ranged Power.

Feat.Name: Whirling Steel Strike
Feat.Description: You treat longswords as if they were monk weapons, remaining centered when you wield them.

Feat.Name: Whirlwind Attack
Feat.Description: Tactical Melee Cleave: Make a martial arts attack that hits all enemies in an area twice. This attack deals +2[W] damage.

Feat.Name: Wholeness of Body
Feat.Description: Your enlightenment allows you to heal your own wounds. This feat allows Monks expend 10 Ki to heal some hit points over time in a meditative state. The exact number regained is (Monk level)/2 + Wisdom modifier (rounded up) every two seconds for thirty seconds. This ability is not suitable for use in combat, as the Monk may neither move nor act while regenerating.

Feat.Name: Wild Empathy
Feat.Description: Activate this ability to lower an animal's or beast's aggression, effectively mesmerizing them.

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Bear
Feat.Description: You can transform into Bear form. Bear now allows you to Strikethrough as long as you are not in the Defensive Fighting stance. You can Strikethrough while moving in Bear Form. You gain +2 racial bonus to constitution, +10% exceptional bonus to AC

Stance.Name: Bear
Stance.Description: You transform into a Bear gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Wolf
Feat.Description: You can transform into Wolf form. You gain a +10% Combat Style bonus to attack speed, +3 to attack while flanking, +1d6 sneak attack damage, and +10% to movement speed.

Stance.Name: Wolf
Stance.Description: You transform into a Wolf gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Dire Bear
Feat.Description: You can transform into Dire Bear form. Dire Bear now allows you to Strikethrough as long as you are not in the Defensive Fighting stance. You gain +4 racial bonus to constitution, and +15% exceptional bonus to AC. Gain 20% Strikethrough chance.

Stance.Name: Dire Bear
Stance.Description: You transform into a Dire Bear gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Fire Elemental
Feat.Description: You can transform into Fire Elemental form. When in this form you do 1d6 Fire damage per Imbue Dice that scales with Fire spell power per attack. +1 Imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Fire Elemental
Stance.Description: You transform into a Fire elemental gaining elemental specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Water Elemental
Feat.Description: You can transform into Water Elemental form. When in this form you do 1d6 Cold damage per Imbue Dice that scales with Cold spell power per attack. +3 imbue Dice

Stance.Name: Water Elemental
Stance.Description: You transform into a Water elemental gaining elemental specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Winter Wolf
Feat.Description: You can transform into Winter Wolf form. You gain a +20% combat style bonus to melee attack speed, +5 to attack while flanking, +2d6 sneak attack damage, and +[10+druid level]% to movement speed.

Stance.Name: Winter Wolf
Stance.Description: You transform into a Winter Wolf gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Zen Archery
Feat.Description: You can use your Wisdom bonus instead of Dexterity bonus to determine bonus to attack with ranged missile weapons (but not thrown weapons) if it is higher. You treat shortbows and longbows as if they were Ki weapons.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Alchemist
Feat.Description: You were an Alchemist in a past life. You occasionally find yourself drinking things without knowing what they do. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 Transmutation DC and 20 Maximum Spell Points. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Artificer
Feat.Description: You were an Artificer in a past life. You occasionally find yourself tinkering with your gear. Each time you acquire this feat you gain a stacking +1 bonus to all Intelligence based skills and Use Magic Device. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Barbarian
Feat.Description: You were a Barbarian in a past life. You occasionally find yourself filled with a nearly irresistable urge to smash boxes. With your head. Each time you acquire this feat you gain 10 additional hit points. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Bard
Feat.Description: You were a Bard in a past life. You occasionally find yourself humming a merry tune. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 to saves vs. enchantments and illusions. You gain 1 bard song usage. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Bard (Stormsinger)
Feat.Description: You were a Stormsinger in a past life. You occasionally find yourself wishing for some thunderstorms. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +5 Electric and Sonic Spellpower. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Cleric
Feat.Description: You were a Cleric in a past life. You occasionally feel the presence of the divine. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to the DC's of your Conjuration spells, +1 Turn Undead attempt per rest and you Turn Undead as if you were two levels higher. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Cleric (Dark Apostate)
Feat.Description: You were a Dark Apostate in a past life. You occasionally feel the presence of the heritical. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +5 to your Negative Healing Amplification and Negative Spell Power. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Druid
Feat.Description: You were a Druid in a past life. You occasionally find yourself gazing at the stars and get sentimental around mistletoe. Each time you acquire this feat your summoned creatures, charmed minions and hirelings gain +2 to all ability scores. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Druid (Blight Caster)
Feat.Description: You were a Blight caster in a past life. +5 Acid and Poison Spell Power. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Favored Soul
Feat.Description: You were a Favored Soul in a past life. You occasionally find yourself wishing to leap off of tall things. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to spell penetration checks and gain 20 additional spell points. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Fighter
Feat.Description: You were a Fighter in a past life. You occasionally find yourself filled with the urge to bark orders to your fellows in combat. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to attack rolls and +1 to the DC's of your tactical feats. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Fighter (Dragon Lord)
Feat.Description: You were a Dragon Lord in a past life. Others find you strangely compelling when you speak or take to the battlefield. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 Damage with Melee weapons and +1 Breath Weapon DC. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Monk
Feat.Description: You were a Monk in a past life. You occasionally find yourself contemplating the mysteries of life. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to damage rolls. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Paladin
Feat.Description: You were a Paladin in a past life. You occasionally find yourself overcome with righteous fervor. Each time you acquire this feat you gain 10% positive healing amplification. (This feat can be stacked up to 3 times, providing 10%, 20%, or 30% Healing Amplification.)

Feat.Name: Past Life: Paladin (Sacred Fist)
Feat.Description: You were a Sacred Fist in a past life. You occasionally find yourself contemplating the flickering flame of campfires. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +5% positive healing amplification and +5 Positive Spellpower. This feat can be stacked up to 3 times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Ranger
Feat.Description: You were a Ranger in a past life. You occasionally find small animals in your backpack. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 damage with ranged weapons and +2 to elemental resistances. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Ranger (Dark Hunter)
Feat.Description: You were a Dark Hunter in a past life. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 Sneak Attack Attack and Damage. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Rogue
Feat.Description: You were a Rogue in a past life. You occasionally find yourself looking over your shoulder. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 to saves vs. traps and deal +1 damage when sneak attacking. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Sorcerer
Feat.Description: You were a Sorcerer in a past life. You occasionally find yourself daydreaming of dragons. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 to the DC's of your Evocation spells and gain 20 additional spell points. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Warlock
Feat.Description: You were a Warlock in a past life. You occasionally find yourself throwing your hands into the air. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +3 Magical Resistance. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Warlock (Acolyte of the Skin)
Feat.Description: You were an Acolyte of the Skin in a past life. You are troubled sometimes by a burning sensation on your palms. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +1 Magical resistance rating and +5 Fire Spell Power. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Wizard
Feat.Description: You were a Wizard in a past life. You occasionally find yourself desiring a good book. Each time you acquire this feat you gain +2 to spell penetration checks and the DC's of Wands you use. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Tabaxi Trailblazer
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1 to Trip DCs per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +1 to Saving Throws vs. Traps per stack of this Past Life

Stance.Name: Tabaxi Trailblazer
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1 to Trip DCs per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Aasimar Scourge
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +2% Doublestrike stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1 Fortitude Save per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Aasimar Scourge
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +[2/4/6]% Doublestrike.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Bladeforged
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10 Repair Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +5% Fortification per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Bladeforged
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +[10/20/30] Repair Spell Power.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Morninglord
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +[10/20/30] Light and +[10/20/30] Alignment Spell Power Passive Bonus: +3 Positive Spell Power per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Morninglord
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10 Light and +10 Alignment Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 Positive Spell Power per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Purple Dragon Knight
Feat.Description: Group Action Boost: You and all allies within your aura for 20 seconds gain: +10/15/20% Action Boost bonus to movement speed +[1/2/3] Action Boost bonus to Saving Throws

Feat.Name: Past Life: Shadar-Kai
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: When you are below 50% hit points and get hit by an attack, you gain 25% incorporeality for 6 seconds per Past Life: Shadar-kai (6, 12, or 18 seconds). This can occur once every two minutes. If this triggers along with Ghostly Essence, the bonuses stack their durations. Passive Bonus: +1% Dodge per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Shadar-Kai
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: When you are below 50% hit points and get hit by an attack, you gain 25% incorporeality for 6/12/18 seconds. This can occur once every two minutes.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Tiefling Scoundrel
Feat.Description: Inconic Past Life Stance: +10% Striding per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1 Reflex Saving throws per stack of this Past Life Feat.

Stance.Name: Tiefling Scoundrel
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +10% Striding per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Deep Gnome
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1 Illusion DC to spells you cast and +5 Acid Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 Magical Resistance per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Deep Gnome
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +[1/2/3] Illusion DC and +[5/10/15] Acid Spell Power

Feat.Name: Past Life: Razorclaw Shifter
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1 to Attack and Damage with Melee Weapons per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1 Will Saving Throw per stack of this past life. This feat can be stacked up to three times.

Stance.Name: Razorclaw Shifter
Stance.Description: +1 to Attack and Damage with Melee Weapons per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Ancient Knowledge
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: +3 MRR per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Ancient Knowledge
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: +3 MRR per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Energy Criticals
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: 3% Critical Chance with Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic Spells per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Energy Criticals
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: 3% Critical Chance with Acid, Cold, Electric, Fire, and Sonic Spells per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Enchant Weapon
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Your mainhand equipped weapon gains +1 enhancement bonus per Enchant Weapon past life feat. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Enchant Weapon
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Your mainhand equipped weapon gains +1 enhancement bonus per Enchant Weapon past life feat.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Arcane Alacrity
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Cooldowns on your spells are reduced by 3%. Additional stacks of Arcane Alacrity past life increases this to 6% and then 10%. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Arcane Alacrity
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: Cooldowns on your spells are reduced by 3%. Additional stacks of Arcane Alacrity past life increases this to 6% and then 10%.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Arcane Sphere: Eclipse Power
Feat.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: +1 Spell Penetration per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +1% Absorption of Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage.

Stance.Name: Eclipse Power
Stance.Description: Arcane Past Life Stance: +1 Spell Penetration per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Divine Sphere: Ancient Blessings
Feat.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +5 Positive, Negative and Repair Healing Amplification per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 PRR per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Ancient Blessings
Stance.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +5 Positive, Negative and Repair Healing Amplification per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Divine Sphere: Power Over Life and Death
Feat.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +10 Positive and +10 Negative Energy Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 PRR per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Power Over Life and Death
Stance.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +10 Positive and +10 Negative/Poison Energy Spell Power per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Divine Sphere: Brace
Feat.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +1 to all Saving Throws per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 PRR per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Brace
Stance.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: +1 to all Saving Throws per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Divine Sphere: Block Energy
Feat.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: While blocking, +10% damage absorption against Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage, per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 PRR per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Block Energy
Stance.Description: Divine Past Life Stance: While blocking, +10% damage absorption against Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire damage, per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Martial Sphere: Ancient Tactics
Feat.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +2 to Tactics DCs and +1 to Assassinate DCs per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +2 AC per stack of this Past Life and +1 AC per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Ancient Tactics
Stance.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +2 to Tactics DCs and +1 to Assassinate DCs per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Martial Sphere: Doublestrike
Feat.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +3% Doublestrike per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +2 AC per stack of this Past Life and +1 AC per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Doublestrike
Stance.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +3% Doublestrike per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Martial Sphere: Skill Mastery
Feat.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +1 to all skills per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +2 AC per stack of this Past Life and +1 AC per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Skill Mastery
Stance.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +1 to all skills per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Martial Sphere: Fortification
Feat.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +10% Fortification per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +2 AC per stack of this Past Life and +1 AC per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Fortification
Stance.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +10% Fortification per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Martial Sphere: Trap Damage Absorption
Feat.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +3% Trap Damage Absorption per stack of this Past Life feat. Passive Bonus: +2 AC per stack of this Past Life and +1 AC per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Trap Damage Absorption
Stance.Description: Martial Past Life Stance: +3% Trap Damage Absorption per stack of this Past Life feat.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Primal Sphere: Ancient Power
Feat.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: +2 to Attack per stack of this past life. If you are fighting in Two Handed Fighting style, you also gain +2 Damage per stack of this past life. Passive Bonus: +3 maximum HP and +4 per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Ancient Power
Stance.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: +2 to Attack per stack of this past life. If you are fighting in Two Handed Fighting style, you also gain +2 Damage per stack of this past life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Primal Sphere: Doubleshot
Feat.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: +3% Doubleshot per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 maximum HP and +4 per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Doubleshot
Stance.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: +3% Doubleshot per stack of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Primal Sphere: Fast Healing
Feat.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: Each minute you heal with positive energy, 5 HP + 5 HP per every 5 character levels. Healing is doubled and tripled with two or three stacks of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 maximum HP and +4 per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Fast Healing
Stance.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: Each minute you heal with positive energy, 5 HP + 5 HP per every 5 character levels. Healing is doubled and tripled with two or three stacks of this Past Life.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Primal Sphere: Colors of the Queen
Feat.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: Your unarmed, melee and ranged attacks and spells have a 7% chance to produce a random effect. This triggers at most once every 30 seconds. Additional stacks of this past life reduce the triggered effect cooldown to 20 seconds and then 10 seconds. (Most of the random effects are extra damage or debuffs on the enemy you hit.) Passive Bonus: +3 maximum HP and +4 per ten character levels.

Stance.Name: Colors of the Queen
Stance.Description: Primal Past Life Stance: Your unarmed, melee and ranged attacks and spells have a 7% chance to produce a random effect. This triggers at most once every 30 seconds. Additional stacks of this past life reduce the triggered effect cooldown to 20 seconds and then 10 seconds. (Most of the random effects are extra damage or debuffs on the enemy you hit.)

Feat.Name: Inherent Melee Power
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Melee Power - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Melee Power, in the form of a free Feat

Feat.Name: Inherent Ranged Power
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Ranged Power - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Ranged Power, in the form of a free Feat.

Feat.Name: Inherent Magical Resistance
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Magic Resistance - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Magical Resistance Rating, in the form of a free Feat.

Feat.Name: Inherent Racial Action Point
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Racial Knowledge - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Racial Action Points, in the form of a free Feat.

Feat.Name: Inherent Universal Action Point
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Universal Knowledge - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Universal Action Points, in the form of a free Feat.

Feat.Name: Tome of Destiny
Feat.Description: Entwined within the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +[1/2/3] Point(s) to spend in your Epic Destinies.

Feat.Name: Inherent Spell Power
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Spell Power - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Spell Power, in the form of a free Feat.

Feat.Name: Inherent Physical Resistance
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Physical Resistance - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Physical Resistance Rating, in the form of a free Feat.

Feat.Name: Inherent Fate Point
Feat.Description: Chrism Of Future Fate - Entwined with the words of this thick book is a powerful magical effect that grants a permanent +1 inherent bonus to Fate Points, in the form of a free Feat. Each fate point is worth 2hp and 1 sp. Every 3 fate points earns you a Destiny Action Point.

Feat.Name: Wilderness Lore
Feat.Description: Represents your knowledge of the wilderness

Feat.Name: Arcane Lore
Feat.Description: Represents your knowledge of the Arcane

Feat.Name: Religious Lore
Feat.Description: Represents your knowledge of the Religion

Feat.Name: Arcane Insight
Feat.Description: Activate to gain +6 to all spell DCs and +6 to Spell Penetration for 30 seconds. Duration 30 seconds, 3 minute cooldown Passive: +110 Maximum Spell Point

Stance.Name: Arcane Insight
Stance.Description: Activate to gain +6 to all spell DCs and +6 to Spell Penetration for 30 seconds. Duration 30 seconds, 3 minute cooldown

Feat.Name: Blinding Speed
Feat.Description: You are permanently hasted. You gain: 32% Enhancement Bonus to Movement Speed. 15% Enhancement Bonus to Melee Attack Speed. 15% Enhancement Bonus to Ranged Attack Speed. +1 Enhancement Bonus to Attack Rolls. +1% Dodge Bonus. +1 to Reflex Saving Throws.

Feat.Name: Bulwark of Defense
Feat.Description: Epic Feat: When in a defensive stance, you gain an additional +2 to all saving throws and +4 Armor Class.

Feat.Name: Burst of Glacial Wrath
Feat.Description: Cone spell, deals 300d6 Cold Damage and freezes creatures within the cone. Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Monsters who succeed a Fortitude save of (20 + the highest of your INT/WIS/CHA modifiers + Evocation bonuses) negate the freeze. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points.

DC.Name: Burst of Glacial Wrath
DC.Description: Cone spell, deals 300d6 Cold Damage and freezes creatures within the cone. Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Spell Point Cost: 35 Target: Foe, Directional, Breakable Monsters who succeed a Fortitude save of (20 + the highest of your INT/WIS/CHA modifiers + Evocation bonuses) negate the freeze.

Feat.Name: Combat Archery
Feat.Description: Your ranged damage is increased by +1[W]. You gain a 2% Dodge bonus while using a ranged weapon. In addition, while using a Longbow or Shortbow, you gain +1 Critical Multiplier.

Feat.Name: Construct Exemplar
Feat.Description: You gain +20 Repair Amplification and 10 MRR

Feat.Name: Embolden Spell
Feat.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, you gain +2 to the DC of spells affected by Embolden Spell, but they consume 10 additional spell points. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Epic Damage Reduction

Feat.Name: Epic Eldritch Blast
Feat.Description: +2d8 Eldritch Blast dice, +1 per 2 Epic levels, max +8d8 dice at level 30.

Feat.Name: Epic Fortitude
Feat.Description: +2 Fortitude Saving Throws. You don't automatically fail Fortitude saving throws on a roll of 1.

Feat.Name: Epic Mental Toughness
Feat.Description: Increases your maximum spell points by 200 and your spell critical chance by 1%

Feat.Name: Epic Power

Feat.Name: Epic Knowledge

Feat.Name: Epic Reflexes

Feat.Name: Epic Reputation
Feat.Description: +5 Bluff, Diplomacy, Haggle, Intimidate and Perform.

Feat.Name: Epic Saves
Feat.Description: As part of your epic training, you gain +1 to all saves. This feat can be acquired multiple times and is granted every other epic level.

Feat.Name: Epic Skills
Feat.Description: As part of your epic training, you gain +1 to all skills. This feat can be acquired multiple times and is granted every epic level.

Feat.Name: Expanded Clip
Feat.Description: Your repeating crossbows have 1 extra shot in their clips.

Feat.Name: Epic Barbarian Damage Reduction
Feat.Description: Your Barbarian Damage Reduction is increased by 1%. You also gain +5 Physical and Magical Resistance Rating.

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Focus: Abjuration
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Abjuration school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Focus: Conjuration
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Conjuration school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Focus: Enchantment
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Enchantment school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Description: Your spells from the Evocation school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Focus: Illusion
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Illusion school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Focus: Necromancy
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Necromancy school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Focus: Transmutation
Feat.Description: Your spells from the Transmutation school of magic are harder to resist, receiving an additional +1 bonus on save DCs.

Feat.Name: Epic Spell Penetration
Feat.Description: Adds +4 to your caster level check for defeating spell resistance (in addition to the +4 from the Spell Penetration and Greater Spell Penetration feats).

Feat.Name: Epic Toughness
Feat.Description: Increases your maximum hit points by 50.

Feat.Name: Epic Will
Feat.Description: +2 Will Saving Throws. You don't automatically fail Will saving throws on a roll of 1.

Feat.Name: Fate Point
Feat.Description: You have 1 aditional fate point

Feat.Name: Great Charisma
Feat.Description: Your powers of persuasion and leadership are greater than normal. Your charisma increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Great Constitution
Feat.Description: Your health and endurance are greater than normal. Your constitution increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Great Dexterity
Feat.Description: Your agility and coordination are greater than normal. Your dexterity increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Great Intelligence
Feat.Description: Your powers of reason and learning are greater than normal. Your intelligence increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Great Strength
Feat.Description: Your muscle and physical power are greater than normal. Your strength increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Great Wisdom
Feat.Description: Your willpower and insight are greater than normal. Your wisdom increases by 1. This feat can be taken multiple times.

Feat.Name: Greater Ruin
Feat.Description: Deal 1000 untyped damage to a single enemy. Spell Point Cost: 150, No saving throw. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Improved Augment Summoning
Feat.Description: Your summoned creature, charmed minions, pets and hirelings have +8 to all ability scores, +10% Dodge and +100 Maximum Hitpoints Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Improved Martial Arts
Feat.Description: You deal +1[W] when fighting with Handwraps, and +0.5[W] with using other Ki weapons such as kamas, quaterterstaves, and Shuriken.

Feat.Name: Improved Sneak Attack
Feat.Description: Your sneak attacks are more deadly than normal. You gain +3d6 sneak attack damage.

Feat.Name: Inspire Excellence
Feat.Description: You can improve the abilities of your comrades through your performance. This song grants a +2 competence bonus to all ability scores to yourself and all allies near you. Requires 20 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill to use.

Feat.Name: Intensify Spell
Feat.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, you gain 75 Spell Power while casting spells affected by Intensify Spell, but they cost 15 additional spell points. This bonus stacks with Empower. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Stance.Name: Intensify Spell
Stance.Description: While this metamagic feat is active, you gain 75 Spell Power while casting spells affected by Intensify Spell, but they cost 15 additional spell points. This bonus stacks with Empower.

Feat.Name: Master of Air
Feat.Description: Your Shocking Grasp, Electric Loop and Lightning Bolt spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of Alignment
Feat.Description: Your Holy Smite, Deific Vengeance, Unholy Blight, Chaos Hammer and Order's Wrath spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of Artifice
Feat.Description: Your Static Shock, Lightning Sphere, Blast Rod and Lightning Motes spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of Earth
Feat.Description: Your Acid Spray, Acid Arrow and Acid Blast spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of Fire
Feat.Description: Your Burning Hands, Scorch and Fireball spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of Knowledge
Feat.Description: Your Arcane Bolt and Arcane Blast spells now grant you one stack of Mental Honing (+3 Universal Spell Power, +2% Spell Crit Damage) when cast. This effect can stack up to 30 times. One stack is removed every 6 seconds. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Your Spellvial, Multivial, and Elemental Obliteration spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. (This does not include Multivial)
Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of Thorns
Feat.Description: Your Thorn Strike, Splinter Bolt, and Thorn Bloom spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of Water
Feat.Description: Your Cold Ray, Snowball Swarm and Niac's Biting Cold spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of the Dead
Feat.Description: Your Chill Touch, Death Aura and Negative Energy Burst spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Master of the Wilds
Feat.Description: Your Produce Flame, Creeping Cold, Call Lightning and Word of Balance spells gain +10 to their maximum caster level. Passive: +140 Maximum Spell Points

Feat.Name: Overwhelming Critical
Feat.Description: When rolling a 19 or 20 on an attack with any weapons used by the character, your critical damage multiplier is increased by +1.

Feat.Name: Ruin
Feat.Description: Deal 500 untyped damage to a single enemy. (No saving throw.) Cooldown: 15 seconds

Feat.Name: Vorpal Strikes
Feat.Description: Your unarmed strikes are now considered vorpal and slashing. Note: Vorpal Strikes is a stance, similar to power attack. It can be turned on and off and is off when you first log in.

Stance.Name: Vorpal Strikes
Stance.Description: Your unarmed strikes are now considered vorpal and slashing.

Feat.Name: Watchful Eye
Feat.Description: If you pass withing 5 feet of a trap, you make a Search check to notice it as if actively Searching. (You still need the Trapfinding feat to successfully Search for difficult traps.)

Effect.DisplayName: Shiradi Champion: Pierce Deception / Watchful Eye

Feat.Name: Watchful Eye
Feat.Description: If you pass withing 5 feet of a trap, you make a Search check to notice it as if actively Searching. (You still need the Trapfinding feat to successfully Search for difficult traps.)

Feat.Name: Wellspring of Power
Feat.Description: Activate to gain +150 Universal Spell Power and +20% Spell Critical Damage for 30 seconds. Target: Self Duration: 30 seconds 3 minute cooldown. Passive: +110 Maximum Spell Points

Stance.Name: Wellspring of Power
Stance.Description: Activate to gain +150 Universal Spell Power and +20% Spell Critical Damage for 30 seconds. Target: Self Duration: 30 seconds 3 minute cooldown.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Aasimar
Feat.Description: You were Aasimar in a previous life Tier1: +1 Heal Tier2: +1 Wisdom Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point
