Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: Black
Feat.Description: Your ancestry is linked to Black Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Acid Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: Blue
Feat.Description: Your ancestry is linked to Blue Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Electric Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: Red
Feat.Description: You ancestry is linked to Red Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Fire Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Draconic Ancestry: White
Feat.Description: You ancestry is linked to White Dragons of a bygone age. You gain a stacking bonus to Cold Energy Resistance equal to your Character Level. This choice also selects the element you will gain bonuses with the Dragonborn Racial Enhancement Tree.

Feat.Name: Beasthide Shifter
Feat.Description: Passive: +1 Constitution Active: Activate this Shifter ability to shift your form, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Armor Class and Constitution, a +2 Morale bonus to Fortitude saves, and a -2 penalty to Wisdom. When the form ends, however, you will lose the hit points granted by increased Constitution and become fatigued. Your form will last for 30 seconds plus an additional amount of time based on your Constitution. You can prematurely end your form by using the Dismiss Rage feat. This shares charges with Barbarian's Rage feat, and anything that grants bonuses while Raging will grant bonuses with this. Shifting your form in this way prevents Spellcasting, and prevents use of other abilities that cannot be used while Raging.

Stance.Name: Beasthide Shifter: Shifted Form
Stance.Description: Activate this Shifter ability to shift your form, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Armor Class and Constitution, a +2 Morale bonus to Fortitude saves, and a -2 penalty to Wisdom. When the form ends, however, you will lose the hit points granted by increased Constitution and become fatigued.

Feat.Name: Wildhunt Shifter
Feat.Description: Passive: +1 Wisdom Active: Activate this Shifter ability to shift your form, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Wisdom and Dexterity, a +2 Morale bonus to Will saves, and a -2 penalty to Strength. When the form ends, however, you will become fatigued. Your form will last for 30 seconds plus an additional amount of time based on your Wisdom. You can prematurely end your form by using the Dismiss Rage feat. This shares charges with Barbarian's Rage feat, and anything that grants bonuses while Raging will grant bonuses with this, with the exception of abilities that add Strength while Raging. Shifting your form in this way prevents Spellcasting, and prevents use of other abilities that cannot be used while Raging.

Stance.Name: Wildhunt Shifter: Shifted Form
Stance.Description: Active: Activate this Shifter ability to shift your form, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Wisdom and Dexterity, a +2 Morale bonus to Fortitude saves, and a -2 penalty to Strength. When the form ends, however, you will become fatigued.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Blindness
Feat.Description: Renders an enemy blinded. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Rage
Feat.Description: This area of effect spell grants to targets +2 morale bonus to Strength and to Constitution, +1 morale bonus on will saves and a -2 penalty to Armor Class. The spell's duration is 60 + 6 seconds per caster level.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Knock
Feat.Description: Unlocks locked doors and chests as if a Rogue with a Open Lock skill of caster level+casting ability modifier (Charisma for Warlocks) was attempting to pick the lock.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Soundburst
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Spawn Screen
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Gust of Wind
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Slow
Feat.Description: One target moves at 50% run speed, attacks at a 30% slowed rate, -1 on Attack rolls, Armor Class and Reflex saves. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Fire Shield
Feat.Description: Wreaths the caster in hot or cold flames. Any creature striking you in melee takes 1d3+3 plus 1 per caster level (Maximum caster level 15.) damage. The Fire version of this spell deals fire damage and reduces damage the caster takes from cold by half. The cold version of this spell deals cold damage and reduces damage the caster takes from fire by half. The flame from the fire version will burn away any webs that attempt to entangle you.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Phantasmal Killer
Feat.Description: A target who fails a Will saving throw followed by a failed Fortitude saving throw dies from fear. A successful Fortitude save still results in 1d3 + 1 damage per caster level. A Will save disbelieves the spell and negates ill effects.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Magic Circle against Evil
Pact Magic: Greater Dispel Magic
Feat.Description: Removes ongoing spells that have been cast on a target. You must make a caster level check of 1d20+your caster level (Maximum caster level 20.) of DC 11+spell's caster level to remove an effect. In addition, this spell can be used to sever the connection between a summoner and his or her summoned monster, causing the summoned creature to attack unpredictably, possibly turning on its summoner. If cast on a spell ward trap, this spell will reduce the level of the trap by 1d4 levels. If the level of the trap is reduced to 0, the trap is disabled.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Binding Chain
Feat.Description: Spell info here

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Dominate Person
Feat.Description: You can control the actions of any humanoid creature that fails its Will save through a telepathic link that you establish with the subjects mind. Dominate acts like Charm Person, with additional Will saves every 15 to 30 seconds, but the creature will follow you throughout the dungeon.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Prayer
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Death Aura
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Ice Storm
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Otto's Sphere of Dancing
Feat.Description: A magical sphere that compels all enemies who enter it to dance. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Power Word: Blind
Feat.Description: A single word of power is uttered, causing your target to become Blinded. Creatures are Blinded for at least 6+6d4 seconds and players are Blinded for at least 4+1d6 seconds. Creatures with more than 100,000 Hit Points are unaffected by Power Word: Blind.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Mass Suggestion
Feat.Description: Casts Suggestion on multiple enemies. The actions of affected enemies are influenced by you, allowing you to suggest that they fight as your allies for 6 seconds per caster level. A successful Will save negates this effect.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Holy Aura
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Niac's Biting Cold
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Otto's Irresistible Dance
Feat.Description: This spell makes it impossible for the enemy to do anything other than caper and prance in place.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Howl of Terror
Feat.Description: You utter a terrifying howl, filling your foes with a paralyzing fear. Foes around you are paralyzed for 6 to 24 seconds. Will save negates.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Power Word: Kill
Feat.Description: A single word causes the death of a single enemy with no saving throw allowed. Cooldown timer of 210 seconds.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Freedom of Movement
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Name: Pact Magic: Rend the Soul
Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Description: This spell is added to your Warlock spell book.

Feat.Description: You are unnaturally resilient due to your fiendish association. +1 Fortitude saving throws

Feat.Name: Thought Shield

Feat.Description: +1 Fortitude saving throws

Feat.Name: Follower of Aureon
Feat.Description: You follow Aureon, member of the Sovereign Host and use his favored weapon. You are proficient with Quarterstaves and gain +1 to hit with them. Quarterstaves are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Blood of Vol
Feat.Description: You follow the Blood of Vol. You are proficient with Daggers and gain +1 to hit with them. Daggers are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Lord of Blades
Feat.Description: You follow the Lord of Blades. You are proficient with Great Swords and gain +1 to hit with them. Great Swords are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of Olladra
Feat.Description: You follow Olladra, member of the Sovereign Host and use his favorite weapon. You are proficient with Sickles and gain +1 to hit with them. Sickles are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of Onatar
Feat.Description: You follow Onatar, member of the Sovereign Host and use his favorite weapon. You are proficient with Warhammers and gain +1 to hit with them. Warhammers considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Silver Flame
Feat.Description: You follow the Silver Flame. You are proficient with Longbows and gain +1 to hit with them. Longbows are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Sovereign Host
Feat.Description: You follow the Sovereign Host. You are proficient with Longswords and gain +1 to hit with them. Longswords are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Undying Court
Feat.Description: You follow the Undying Court. You are proficient with Scimitars and gain +1 to hit with them. Scimitars are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of Vulkoor
Feat.Description: You follow Vulkoor. You are proficient with Shortswords and gain +1 to hit with them. Shortswords are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Favored by Amaunator
Feat.Description: You follow Amaunator. You are proficient with heavy maces and gain +1 to hit with them. Heavy maces are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Favored by Helm
Feat.Description: You follow Helm. You are proficient with Bastard Swords and gain +1 to hit with them. Bastard swords are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Favored by Silvanus
Feat.Description: You follow Silvanus. You are proficient with mauls and gain +1 to hit with them. Mauls are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Dark Six
Feat.Description: You follow the Dark Six. You are proficient with Sickles and gain +1 to hit with them. Sickles are considered as a favored weapon.

Feat.Name: Follower of the Path of Light
Feat.Description: You follow the Path of Light. You are proficient with Handwraps and they are considered as a favored weapon. You gain +1 to hit with Favored Weapons.

Feat.Name: Child of Faith
Feat.Description: Your connection to your Deity strengthens. You gain bonuses to Attack and Damage rolls with all Favored Weapons you wield. Simple and Martial Favored Weapons gain +2 to Attack and Damage. Exotic Favored Weapons gain +1 to Attack and Damage.

Feat.Name: Divine Dream
Feat.Description: While centered, you can use your Charisma for Attack and Damage and you are considered to be wearing Heavy Armor for the purpose of the Sacred Defender tree.

Feat.Name: Search the Soul
Feat.Description: You are seeking guidance to new paths of Faith. Passive: You gain +3 to the Concentration skill. As this Feat has no particular required Deity, while you have this feat (and assuming you meet all other requirements), you can exchange your Deity with a Feat Exchange (using normal Feat Exchange rules and costs).

Feat.Name: Aureon's Instruction
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Aureon and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Aureon's wisdom for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Wisdom, +3 to Spell Penetration, +2 to your effective level for Turn Undead, +4 to maximum Hit Dice affected when using Turn Undead and +4 to the total Hit Dice affected by Turn Undead.

Stance.Name: Aureon's Instruction
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Aureon and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Aureon's wisdom for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Wisdom, +3 to Spell Penetration, +2 to your effective level for Turn Undead, +4 to maximum Hit Dice affected when using Turn Undead and +4 to the total Hit Dice affected by Turn Undead.

Feat.Name: The Blood is The Life
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of The Blood of Vol and your zeal has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the power within your own blood for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Constitution, 100% Fortification, +10 to Fortitude Saves, PRR and MRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have. While in this state and have a Dagger in your main hand, you also gain Vampirism, stacking with other sources of Vampirism.

Requirement.Feat: Follower of the Blood of Vol

Stance.Name: The Blood is The Life
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of The Blood of Vol and your zeal has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the power within your own blood for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +4 Constitution, 100% Fortification, +10 to Fortitude Saves, PRR and MRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have. While in this state and have a Dagger in your main hand, you also gain Vampirism, stacking with other sources of Vampirism.

Feat.Name: Bladesworn Transformation
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Lord of Blades and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to attempt to become a juggernaut of destruction for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. While transformed, you have a +4 Profane bonus to Strength, +4 natural armor bonus to AC, a +4 profane bonus on damage rolls, +10 enhancement bonus to Will saves against mind affecting magic and proficiency in all simple and martial weapons. Your base attack bonus equals your level. You lose your spellcasting ability. You have immunity to critical hits and sneak attacks, but cannot be healed by healing spells.

Requirement.Feat: Follower of the Lord of Blades

Stance.Name: Bladesworn Transformation
Stance.Description: You become a juggernaut of destruction for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. While transformed, you have a +4 Profane bonus to Strength, +4 natural armor bonus to AC, a +4 profane bonus on damage rolls, +10 enhancement bonus to Will saves against mind affecting magic and proficiency in all simple and martial weapons. Your base attack bonus equals your level. You lose your spellcasting ability. You have immunity to critical hits and sneak attacks, but cannot be healed by healing spells.

Feat.Name: Luck of Olladra
Feat.Description: Luck of Olladra: You are a devoted follower of Olladra and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to heal yourself or an ally to full health and bestow +1d6 Luck bonus to each Ability Score, lasting 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have.

Feat.Name: Onatar's Forge
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Onatar and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Onatar's mighty forge for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +3 to tactical feat DCs, +10 Melee Power, +10 Repair Spell Power, +10 Rust Spell Power and +10 Fire Spell Power. If you are a Warforged or otherwise already benefit from Repair, you gain +30 Repair Amplification.

Stance.Name: Onatar's Forge
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Onatar and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to channel the power of Onatar's mighty forge for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain +3 to tactical feat DCs, +10 Melee Power, +10 Repair Spell Power, +10 Rust Spell Power and +10 Fire Spell Power. If you are a Warforged or otherwise already benefit from Repair, you gain +30 Repair Amplification.

Feat.Name: Silver Flame Exorcism
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Silver Flame and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to attempt to exorcise an extraplanar creature, which is entirely consumed in holy fire on a failed Will save or savagely burned by the light of the Silver Flame. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage to half. The Save DC for this ability is 10 + Cleric Level + Charisma Modifier.

DC.Name: Silver Flame Exorcism (Cleric)
DC.Description: Activate this ability to attempt to exorcise an extraplanar creature, which is entirely consumed in holy fire on a failed Will save or savagely burned by the light of the Silver Flame. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage to half.

DC.Name: Silver Flame Exorcism (Dark Apostate)
DC.Description: Activate this ability to attempt to exorcise an extraplanar creature, which is entirely consumed in holy fire on a failed Will save or savagely burned by the light of the Silver Flame. A successful Fortitude save reduces the damage to half.

Feat.Name: Undying Call
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Undying Court and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to lead a dead ally's spirit back to this world, acting as a True Resurrection on high elven spirits or a Raise Dead for others.

Feat.Name: Unyielding Sovereignty
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Sovereign Host and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to fully heal hit point damage done to a targeted ally, remove ability damage, death penalty effects, negative levels and the conditions blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, deafened, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, feebleminded, insanity, nauseated, poisoned and stunned.

Feat.Name: Vulkoor's Avatar
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Vulkoor and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to ask Vulkoor to send one of his servants to destroy your enemies. Duration: 10 minutes

Feat.Name: Amaunator's Brilliance
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Amaunator and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to turn on your Fire Shield (Fire).

Feat.Name: Ever Watchful
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Helm and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the vigilance of Helm for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain True Seeing, +5 Sacred bonus to Spot and Search, +4 Wisdom, +5 to Fortitude saves and PRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have.

Stance.Name: Ever Watchful
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Helm and your faith has been rewarded. Activate this ability to draw upon the vigilance of Helm for 24 seconds plus 6 seconds per Religious Lore feat you have. In this state, you gain True Seeing, +5 Sacred bonus to Spot and Search, +4 Wisdom, +5 to Fortitude saves and PRR equal to the number of Religious Lore feats you have.

Feat.Name: Blessing of Silvanus
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of Silvanus and your faith has been rewarded. Toggling this on gives you Blessing of Silvanus: You permanently gain a +4 natural armor bonus to AC and Mauls you wield gain +2 to their Critical Threat Range.

Stance.Name: Blessing of Silvanus
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of Silvanus and your faith has been rewarded. Toggling this on gives you Blessing of Silvanus: You permanently gain a +4 natural armor bonus to AC and Mauls you wield gain +2 to their Critical Threat Range.

Feat.Name: Profane Imbuement
Feat.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Dark Six and your faith has been rewarded. Toggling this on gives you Profane Imbuement: You permanently gain a +3 to saving throws vs magic, and sickles you wield gain +2 to their Critical Threat Range and are considered two handed weapons. You gain additional animations while using sickles.

Stance.Name: Profane Imbuement
Stance.Description: You are a devoted follower of the Dark Six and your faith has been rewarded. Toggling this on gives you Profane Imbuement: You permanently gain a +3 to saving throws vs magic, and sickles you wield gain +2 to their Critical Threat Range and are considered two handed weapons. You gain additional animations while using sickles.

Feat.Name: Beloved of the Divine
Feat.Description: Your connection to your Deity strengthens. You gain bonuses to Attack and Damage rolls with all Favored Weapons you wield: Simple Favored Weapons gain +3 to Attack and Damage. Martial Favored Weapons gain +2 to Attack and Damage. Exotic Favored Weapons gain +1 to Attack and Damage.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Lord of Blades Damage Reduction: Adamantine
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Lord of Blades fear not the weapons of most opponents. You gain damage reduction 10/adamantine, or improve your existing damage reduction by 10/adamantine.

Requirement.Feat: Follower of the Lord of Blades

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Undying Court Damage Reduction: Cold Iron
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Undying Court can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Vulkoor the Hunter Damage Reduction: Good
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Vulkoor the Hunter can ward themselves against all but the light. You gain damage reduction 10/Good.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Silver Flame Damage Reduction: Silver
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Silver Flame can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Silver.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Sovereign Host Damage Reduction: Cold Iron, Silver
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Sovereign Host can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron, Silver.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Amaunator Damage Reduction: Silver
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Amaunator fear not the weapons of most opponents. You gain damage reduction 10/Silver, or improve your existing damage reduction by 10/Silver.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Aureon Damage Reduction: Cold Iron
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Aureon can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of the Blood of Vol Damage Reduction: Good
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of the Blood of Vol can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Good.

Requirement.Feat: Follower of the Blood of Vol

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Helm Damage Reduction: Adamantine
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Helm can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Adamantine.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Olladra Damage Reduction: Cold Iron
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Olladra can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Onatar Damage Reduction: Cold Iron
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Onatar can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Cold Iron.

Feat.Name: Favored Soul of Silvanus Damage Reduction: Silver
Feat.Description: Favored Souls of Silvanus can turn aside most weapons. You gain damage reduction 10/Silver.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Evocation spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. Your lightning spells will use Light Spell Power if it is higher, and your light spells will use Lightning Spell power if it is higher. Turn Undead now works on Elemental creatures. Additionally, using Turn Undead provides a bonus to your party's Reflex saving throws equal to half of your Cleric level and Electric Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level, for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 Spot, +1 Listen and +1 Reflex saving throws for every 2 Cleric levels. Your Turn Undead works on Animal creatures. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Constitution equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to Will saving throws for every 2 Cleric levels. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains 1d20 points of Universal Spell Power and 1d10 points (each rolled separately) of Melee Power, Ranged Power, Physical Resistance Rating and Magical Resistance Rating.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Necromancy spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. You gain +2 to your effective Cleric level to Turn Undead and +2 to the hit dice of undead effected.

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 Melee and Ranged Power. You gain another point of each at Cleric levels 4, 8, 12, 16 and 20. You can cast your Cleric spells while Raging. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Melee and Ranged Power equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Acid Spell Power (Corrosion) per Cleric Level. Your acid spells will use Light Spell Power if it is higher. Your light spells will use Acid Spell Power if it is higher. Your Turn Undead works on Elemental creatures. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a bonus to Fortitude saving throws equal to half your Cleric level and points of Acid Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Fire Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Fire Spell Power (Combustion) per Cleric Level. Your fire spells will use Light Spell Power if it is higher. Your light spells will use Fire Spell Power if it is higher. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Fire Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds. Your Turn Undead works on Elemental creatures.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Light Spell Power (Radiance) per Cleric Level. You gain +1 to the Heal skill for every 2 Cleric levels. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains temporary Hit Points equal to five times your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Positive Spell Power (Devotion) per Cleric Level. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains 20 points of Healing Amplification.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 to all skills. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Intelligence equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Enchantment spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use your Turn Undead, your party gains a Sacred bonus to saving throws equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to your Fortitude, Reflex and Will saving throws. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to saving throws equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Evocation spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Universal Spell Power equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to Armor Class, Physical Resistance Rating, and Magical Resistance Rating. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 5, 10, 15 and 20. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to PRR and MRR equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 Strength. You passively restore all ability score damage to Strength every 6 seconds. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Strength equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +2 to Fire (Combustion) and Light Spell Power (Radiance) per Cleric level. When you use Turn Undead, you and your allies gain True Sight. In addition, for 20 seconds, enemies in the radius of the Turn Undead have their Incorporeal miss chance negated and will be inflicted with 10% Vulnerability to Light damage.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to the DC of your Enchantment spells. This increases by +1 at Cleric levels 6, 12 and 18. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains points of Charisma equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain +1 to-hit and damage with melee and ranged weapons. This increases at Cleric levels 4, 8, 12, 16 and 20. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a Divine bonus to Melee Power and Ranged Power equal to half your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier I
Feat.Description: You gain Water Breathing. You gain +1 to Swimming and +2 Cold Spell Power (Glaciation) per Cleric level. Your cold spells will use Positive Spell Power if it is higher. Your healing spells will use Cold Spell Power if it is higher. Your Turn Undead works on Elemental creatures. When you use Turn Undead, your party gains a bonus to Will saving throws equal to half you Cleric level and points of Cold Resistance equal to twice your Cleric level for 20 seconds.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Shocking Grasp as an SLA. 4 Spell Points, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Lightning Bolt as an SLA. 8 Spell Points, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Air Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Chain Lightning as an SLA. 12 Spell Points, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain 4 hit points per Cleric level. You also add 2 hit points for each Epic/Legendary level you have gained.

Effect.DisplayName: Animal Domain I: Dark Apostate Levels

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain +15% Fortification bypass.

Feat.Name: Animal Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain the Feral Charge ability. Your character briefly morphs into a bear and charges forward through foes, attacking all foes in the charge area. The attack does weapon damage based on your equipped weapon with a +3[W] bonus and enemies must make a Reflex saving throw with a DC of 19 + Wisdom modifier + Trip Bonuses or be knocked down. Cooldown is 15 seconds. This ability can only be used while holding a melee weapon.

DC.Name: Animal Domain Tier IV
DC.Description: The attack does weapon damage based on your equipped weapon with a +3[W] bonus and enemies must make a Reflex saving throw.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Chaos Hammer as an SLA. 6 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Chaos Hammer as an SLA. 6 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Chaos Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Prismatic Spray as an SLA. 25 SP, 15 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Necrotic Ray as an SLA. 8 Spell Points, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You are immune to Energy Drain.

Feat.Name: Death Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Destruction as an SLA. 20 SP, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: Durability damage for your items is reduced by 75%.

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: +3% Doublestrike and +5% Strikethrough

Feat.Name: Destruction Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: Your weapon strikes add a stack of Improved Destruction.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Melf's Acid Arrow as an SLA. 4 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Stoneskin as an SLA. 6 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Earth Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Earthquake as an SLA. 25 SP, 30 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Improved Domain of Fire
Feat.Description: You gain Scorching Ray as an SLA. 4 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Greater Domain of Fire
Feat.Description: You gain Wall of Fire as an SLA. 15 SP, 30 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Fire Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Firestorm as an SLA. 8 Spell Points, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Deific Vengeance as an SLA. 2 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Blade Barrier as an SLA. 20 Spell Points, 30 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Good Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain +3 to hit, damage and armor class against evil creatures in combat. You gain +3 to saving throws against spells cast by evil creatures.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Cure Moderate Wounds as an SLA. 4 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Panacea as an SLA. 8 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Healing Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: Your healing spells are Empowered, as if you had the Empower Healing Metamagic Feat. This does not increase the cost of your healing spells.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Suggestion as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Feeblemind as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Knowledge Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain +4 Spell Penetration. You gain +2 to the DC of all spells.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Order's Wrath as an SLA. 6 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Greater Command as an SLA. 15 SP, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Law Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain +3 to hit, damage and Armor Class against Chaotic creatures in combat. You gain +3 to saving throws against spells cast by Chaotic creatures.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Displacement as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You add +2 to the DC of your spells.

Feat.Name: Luck Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You no longer automatically fail your saving throws on a roll of 1.

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Chain Missiles as an SLA. 8 SP, 10 second cooldown. (This shares a cooldown with the Archmage SLA.)

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain a number of bonus Spell Points equal to your character level x 10.

Feat.Name: Magic Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain points of Universal Spell Power equal to twice your Cleric level.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain the Shield spell as a permanent effect on you.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Radiant Forcefield as an SLA. 10 Spell Points, 180 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Protection Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: Your Armor Class and Physical Resistance Rating are increased by your Cleric level.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: Your Reflex saving throws are now based on Strength instead of Dexterity if it is higher.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You become immune to knock down effects.

Feat.Name: Strength Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You always make your saving throw against Stun effects.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Searing Light as an SLA. 4 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Sunbeam as an SLA. 8 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Sun Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Sunburst as an SLA. 20 SP, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Invisibility as an SLA. 4 SP, 4 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Mind Fog as an SLA. 15 SP, 10 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Trickery Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Charm Monster, Mass as an SLA. 40 SP, 20 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain proficiency in all Martial and Exotic weapons.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: Your tactical DCs are increased by half your Cleric level.

Feat.Name: War Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Holy Sword as an SLA. 10 SP, 6 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier II
Feat.Description: You gain Solid Fog as an SLA. 10 SP, 12 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier III
Feat.Description: You gain Cone of Cold as an SLA. 10 SP, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Water Domain Tier IV
Feat.Description: You gain Greater Creeping Cold as an SLA. 10 SP, 8 second cooldown.

Feat.Name: Grace of Battle
Feat.Description: Your faith allows you to use your Charisma bonus for to-hit and damage purposes with your dieties' Favored Weapon if it is higher than your Strength bonus. This benefit only applies if your Favored Soul level is equal to or greater than half of your total Heroic Character level.

Feat.Name: Knowledge of Battle
Feat.Description: Your faith allows you to use your Wisdom bonus for to-hit and damage purposes with your dieties' Favored Weapon if it is higher than your Strength bonus. This benefit only applies if your Favored Soul level is equal to or greater than half of your total Heroic Character level.

Feat.Name: Stout of Heart
Feat.Description: You gain 4 Hitpoints per Favored Soul level and 2 Hitpoints per Epic/Legendary level.

Effect.DisplayName: Stout of Heart: Favored Soul Levels

Feat.Name: Purity of Heart
Feat.Description: You gain 20 Spell Points per Favored Soul level and 30 Spell Points per Epic level.

Effect.DisplayName: Purity of Heart: Favored Soul Levels

Feat.Name: Aasimar: Protector Bond
Feat.Description: While protector stance is active you gain +1 Charisma and +1 to Will saving throws.

Stance.Name: Aasimar: Protector Bond
Stance.Description: While this stance is active you gain +1 Charisma and +1 to Will saving throws. You also gain access to your Healing Hands ability, plus any additional enhancements trained dependant on this stance being active

Feat.Name: Aasimar: Fallen Bond
Feat.Description: While fallen stance is active you gain +1 Strength and +1 to Reflex saving throws.

Stance.Name: Aasimar: Fallen Bond
Stance.Description: While this stance is active you gain +1 Strength and +1 to Reflex saving throws. You also gain access to your Healing Hands ability, plus any additional enhancements trained dependant on this stance being active

Feat.Name: Aasimar: Scourge Bond
Feat.Description: While Scourge stance is active you gain +1 Constitution and +1 to Fortitude saving throws.

Stance.Name: Aasimar: Scourge Bond
Stance.Description: While this stance is active you gain +1 Constitution and +1 to Fortitude saving throws. You also gain access to your Healing Hands ability, plus any additional enhancements trained dependant on this stance being active

Feat.Name: Aasimar Racial Traits
Feat.Description: You gain a racial lay on hands SLA which heals for 10 + Character Level * Wisdom Modifier. +2 Racial bonus to Heal, Listen and Spot. +5 Resistance to Cold, Acid and Electricity

Feat.Name: Razorclaw Shifter
Feat.Description: Passive: +1 Strength Active: Activate this Shifter ability to shift your form, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Strength and Dexterity, a +2 Morale bonus to Fortitude saves, and a -2 penalty to Wisdom. When the form ends, however, you will become fatigued. Your form will last for 30 seconds plus an additional amount of time based on your Constitution. You can prematurely end your form by using the Dismiss Rage feat. This shares charges with Barbarian's Rage feat, and anything that grants bonuses while Raging will grant bonuses with this. Shifting your form in this way prevents Spellcasting

Stance.Name: Razorclaw Shifter: Shifted Form
Stance.Description: Activate this Shifter ability to shift your form, granting you a +4 Rage bonus to Strength and Dexterity, a +2 Morale bonus to Fortitude saves, and a -2 penalty to Wisdom. When the form ends, however, you will become fatigued. Your form will last for 30 seconds plus an additional amount of time based on your Constitution.

Feat.Name: Shifter Traits
Feat.Description: You are considered both a Humanoid and an Animal for the purpose of most spells and effects, such as the Magic Fang spell.

Feat.Name: Bardic Ballad
Feat.Description:
You are constantly surrounded by a faint aura of Bardic Music, and it benfits you and your nearby allies in combat. You and all nearby allies receive the benefits of Inspire Courage as long as you are alive and not incapacitated. Certain Bard feats and abilities can alter or increase the benefits of your Aria.
Inspire Courage: You and nearby allies benefit from +1 to hit, damage, saves vs Fear, and +3 Universal Spell Power. Duration: 1 Minute

Feat.Name: Bardic Inspiration
Feat.Description:
Activate this ability to Inspire a single target ally or yourself. This ability's base duration is 5 minutes plus 30 seconds per Bard level. Fuure Bard abilities can modify or increase the effect of your inspiration, and gaining more effective Bard Level will increase the duration of this ability. At Bard Level 3, this automaticall includes Inspire Competence.
Inspire Competence: Grants you or a single ally +4 Music Bonus to all Skills.

Feat.Name: Suggestion
Feat.Description: Activate this bard ability to charm a fascinated foe for a short time. Requires 9 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill to use.

DC.Name: Suggestion
DC.Description: Activate this bard ability to charm a fascinated foe for a short time. Requires 9 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill to use.

Feat.Name: Soothing Song
Feat.Description:
Sing a Song to apply a small positive energy heal to your target and nearby party members.
In addition, your inspire courage now gives an additional +1 bonus to attack, damage, and fear saves, and +3 Universal Spell Power

Feat.Name: Ballad Melody: Greatness
Feat.Description:
Adds the effects of Inspire Greatness to your Bardic Ballad. Other Bard abilities may modify and increase the effects of Inspire Greatness.
Inspire Greatness: Allies and yourself benefit from +20 Temporary Hit Points, +3 Physical Resistance Rating, and +10 Healing Amplification as long as you are not incapacitated and they are within the Ballad.
Requires 12 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill.

Feat.Name: Song of Freedom
Feat.Description: Activate this bard ability to create an effect equivalent to the break enchantment spell on one of your allies. Requires 15 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill.

Feat.Name: Improved Bardic Music
Feat.Description: Inspire Greatness now grants an additional +1 to all Skills, and Inspire Heroics now grants an additional +1 to Armor Class, Dodge, and all Saves. You sing your Bardic Inspiration as if you had two more Bard Levels.

Feat.Name: Improved Inspire Courage
Feat.Description: Your Inspire Courage now gives an additional +2 bonus to attack, damage, and fear saves, and an additional +3 Universal Spell Power. Duration: 1 minute

Feat.Name: Inspire Heroics
Feat.Description: Adds the effects of Inspire Heroics to your Bardic Ballad. Inspire Heroics: +4 Music bonus to all saves, +4 Music bonus to Armor Class, and +4% Music bonus to Dodge. Requires 18 trained ranks (not total mod) of the Perform skill to use.

Feat.Name: Knight's Training
Feat.Description:
You have undergone rigorous military training with the traditional weapons of war. When wielding one of the following weapons, you are granted the following:
Longswords you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Multiplier
Battle Axes you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range, increasing to +2 Morale bonus if you have Improved Critical: Slashing
Heavy Maces, Morningstars and War Hammers critical threat range is increased by 2.
Morningstars you wield have a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range

Feat.Name: Swords to Plowshares
Feat.Description:
You are an expert with the usage of traditionally nonviolent weapons in impressive ways. When wielding one of the following weapons, you are granted the following:
Kamas, Handwraps, and Sickles you wield gain a +1 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range. Quarterstaves you wield gain a +2 Morale bonus to Critical Threat Range.

Feat.Name: Summer Court Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: +2 saves versus Fey creatures Rank 2: +5 HP. Rank 3: Access to the Feydark Illusionist Tree Rank 4: +2 Diplomacy and Perform

Feat.Name: Morgrave University Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: +2 to Search and Spell Craft Rank 2: +5 HP Rank 3: +2 Saves versus Magical Beasts

Feat.Name: Sharn City Council Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Favor 75 - "Sharn City Council: Skill Bonus" - "This feat grants you +2 bonus to Bluff and Haggle skills." Rank 2: Favor 150 - "Sharn City Council: Hit Point Bonus" - "This feat grants you +5 HP." Rank 3: Favor 225 - Access to the Inquisitive tree

Effect.DisplayName: Sharn City Council: Hit Point Bonus

Feat.Name: Gate Keepers Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Favor 75 - "Gatekeepers: Skill Bonus" - "This feat grants you +2 bonus to Concentration and Spot skills." Rank 2: Favor 150 - "Gatekeepers: Hit Point Bonus" - "This feat grants you +5 HP." Rank 3: favor 400 - Access to the Horizon Walker enhancement tree Rank 4: +2 Saves versus Extraplanar Creatures

Feat.Name: House Jorasco Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1 :"House Jorasco: Skill Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 bonus to the Heal and Diplomacy skills." Rank 2: "House Jorasco: Hit Point Bonus" "This feat grants you +5 HP."

Feat.Name: House Deneith Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: "House Deneith: Skill Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 Intimidate and Search skills." Rank 2: "House Deneith: Hit Points Bonus" "This feat grants you +5 HP."

Feat.Name: Purple Dragon Knight Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: Key to Eveningstar Rank 2: "Purple Dragon Knights: Hit Point Bonus" "This feat grants you +5 HP." Rank 3: Apply Set bonuses to certain items. Rank 4: "Purple Dragon Knights: Save Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 saves versus Evil Creatures."

Effect.DisplayName: Purple Dragon Knights: Hit Point Bonus

Feat.Name: House Phiarlan Favor Rewards
Feat.Description: Rank 1: "House Phiarlan: Skill Bonus" "This feat grants you +2 bonus to Hide and Perform skills."

Feat.Name: The Twelve Favor Rewards

Feat.Name: Alchemical Spellcasting
Feat.Description:
Alchmists have a unique way of combining their spells as they cast them. As an alchemist, your spells are each associated with a different Primer: Crimsonite, Gildleaf, or Ceruleite. Casting a spell from a single Primer and then casting a spell from a different Primer will activate a Reaction depending on the Primer of the spells cast. Reactions come in three variants: Pyrite, Verudite, or Orchidium. You can only have be in one Reaction ata time, and casting an Alchemist spell from a Primer not associated with that Reaction will cancel the Reaction.
Casting a Crimsonite spell and then a Gildleaf, or a Gildleaf spell and then a Crimsonite spell will active a Pyrite Reaction.
Casting a Gildleaf spell and then a Ceruleite spell, or a Ceruleite spell and then a Gildleaf spells will activate a Verdanite Reaction.
Casting a Crimsonite spell and then a Ceruleite spell, or a Ceruleite spell and then a Crimsonite spells will activate a Orchisium Reaction.
Each Reaction does does something unique for 12 seconds upon switching into that Reaction.
Pyrite Reaction: Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power equal to (10 + 6x your Alchemist level) and a -50% Enhancement Bonus to Spell Point Cost.
Verdanite Reaction: Positive and Negative Spell Power equal to (10 + 6x your Alchemist level) and Transmutation and Conjuration DCs equal to (1 + 1 for every 5 Alchemist Levels).
Orchidium Reaction: Physical Resistance rating and Elemental Resistance equal to (10 + 4x your Alchemist Level).
Each Reaction does something unique that lasts for as long as you maintain that Reaction:
Pyrite Reaction: +2 Fire, Cold, Electric, Acid, and Poison Spell Power per Alchemist Level. Verdanite Reaction: +2 Positive and Negative Spell Power per Alchemist Level. Orchidium Reaction: +2 Physical Resistance Rating per Alchemist Level.

Stance.Name: Orchidium Spike

Feat.Name: Inscribe Alchemy Recipe
Feat.Description:
You are able to copy alchemical formulae from Recipes into your spell book. This action will destroy the Recipe.
To do this, you will need a Recipe for an Alchemist spell you do not yet know, and Spell Inscription Materials for the Spell Level of the Spell you are trying to inscribe. (Spell Inscription Materials may be purchased for Gold in the Harbor, the Marketplace, or Feather's Fall Apothecary in House Jorasco, among other places).
When you have materials, you can inscribe the scroll by dragging this feat to a shortcut bar, clicking on the scroll in your Inventory, then clicking on this feat on your shortcut bar.

Feat.Name: Alchemy on the Run
Feat.Description: You can now drink potions while moving without being interrupted.

Feat.Name: Alchemical Studies: Orchidium

Feat.Name: Alchemist Knowledge: Potions

You gain a +2 bonus to Use Magic Device checks when using potions, and their Caster Level is increased by one. This caster level bonus increases by one at levels 5, 8, 11 and 14 and is capped by your Intelligence Bonus. In addition, you gain +1 to the Caster Level and Max caster Level of Potion-Based spells you cast, like Curative Admixtures and Vial spells

This does not count as a Combat Fighting Style feat.

For Bastard Sword and Dwarven Waraxe, this adds to their existing 10% bonus. This does not work in Animal Form. This does not count as a Combat Fighting Style feat.

Feat.Name: Two Handed Specialty
Feat.Description:
While Two-Handed Fighting: +140% Strikethrough Chance. You also gain a +6 Combat Style bonus to Melee Power while Two-Handed Fighting.
For the purposes of this feat, you are considered to be Two-Handed Fighting while using a Two-Handed Melee Weapon (not including Handwraps). You are also considered to be Two-Handed Fighting while wielding a Bastard Sword or Dwarven Waraxe in your main hand and a Shield, Orb, Rune Arm, or Nothing in your off-hand. You are not considered to be Two-Handed Fighting while in Druid Animal Forms.
In addition, While using a Two-Handed Weapon, your Ability Score bonus to damage improves to 2.25x the Ability Score Modifier you use for damage. When using a Bastard Sword or Dwarven Waraxe, your Ability Score bonus to damage improves to 1.6x the Ability Score Modifier you use for damage. Neither bonus applies in Animal Form. This does not count as a Combat Fighting Style feat.

Effect.DisplayName: Two Handed Specialty: Hand and a Half

Feat.Name: Two Weapon Specialty
Feat.Description: Reduces the penalty for fighting with two weapons. You gain +60% offhand strike chance. This does not work in Animal Form. This does not count as a Combat Fighting Style feat.

Feat.Name: Wild Force
Feat.Description: While in Druid Wild Shape, you gain some of the aspects of the form you aren't in. While in wolf or winter wolf form, you gain bear form's +10% exceptional bonus to Armor Class. While in bear or dire bear form, you gain wolf form's +10% movement speed.

Feat.Name: Elemental Form Specialty
Feat.Description: Your elemental forms grant you mastery over the other three elements as well. Excluding the element of your current form, you gain the following bonuses to air, earth, fire, and water as long as you are in a Sorcerer's Elemental Apotheosis or Druid Elemental Wild Shape form: +3 Caster Levels with those elements, +3 to Max Caster Level with those elements, +20 to Spell Power of those elements, +2% Spell Critical Chance with those elements.

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Thorn-Kin
Feat.Description:
Hybrid Form: You create a suit of living thorny wood around your body armoring you from harm.
Gain +1 to caster level and max caster level of all Thorn and Poison spells.
10% Exceptional bonus to Armor Class and 50% Fortification.
You become 10% more Vulnerable to Fire.

Stance.Name: Thorn-Kin
Stance.Description:
Hybrid Form: You create a suit of living thorny wood around your body armoring you from harm.
Gain +1 to caster level and max caster level of all Thorn and Poison spells.
10% Exceptional bonus to Armor Class and 50% Fortification.
You become 10% more Vulnerable to Fire.

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Hive Keeper
Feat.Description:
Hybrid Form: You give part of yourself to the hive, gaining insect like reflexes and senses. Your bodily fluids become poisonous to others, and the swarm is your ally.
Gain +1 to caster level and max caster level of all Acid and poison spells.
Gain 25% Concealment and Evasion.
Your reflex saves are increased by 1 every 3 Druid levels and you become 10% more Vulnerable to Cold.

Stance.Name: Hive Keeper
Stance.Description:
Hybrid Form: You give part of yourself to the hive, gaining insect like reflexes and senses. Your bodily fluids become poisonous to others, and the swarm is your ally.
Gain +1 to caster level and max caster level of all Acid and poison spells.
Gain 25% Concealment and Evasion.
Your reflex saves are increased by 1 every 3 Druid levels and you become 10% more Vulnerable to Cold.

Feat.Name: Biting Acid Imbue
Feat.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your mouth drips with acid coating all your weapon attacks, dealing 1d6 Acid damage on hit, scaling with Acid Spell Power. Only applies in any Wolf or Hive Forms.

Stance.Name: Biting Acid Imbue
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your mouth drips with acid coating all your weapon attacks, dealing 1d6 Acid damage on hit, scaling with Acid Spell Power. Only applies in any Wolf or Hive Forms.

Feat.Name: Biting Poison Imbue
Feat.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your mouth drips with poison coating all your weapon attacks, dealing 1d8 Poison damage on hit, scaling with Poison Spell Power. Only applies in any Wolf or Hive Forms.

Stance.Name: Biting Poison Imbue
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your mouth drips with poison coating all your weapon attacks, dealing 1d8 Poison damage on hit, scaling with Poison Spell Power. Only applies in any Wolf or Hive Forms.

Feat.Name: Thorn Imbue
Feat.Description: Imbue Toggle: Wreathe your weapons in thorns, dealing 1d6 Piercing damage on hit, scaling with Force Spell Power. Only applies in Thorn-Kin or Thorn Knight Form.

Stance.Name: Thorn Imbue
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Wreathe your weapons in thorns, dealing 1d6 Piercing damage on hit, scaling with Force Spell Power. Only applies in Thorn-Kin or Thorn Knight Form.

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Plague Wolf
Feat.Description:
Animal Form: Transform into a Plague Wolf. While in this form, you gain a +10% Combat Style bonus to attack speed, a +3 bonus to attack while flanking, 10% bonus to movement speed and you can use either the Biting Acid or Biting Poison Imbue. You gain a -2 penalty to Intelligence and Charisma. While in Wolf form you gain access to a number of spells and enhancements that require Wolf form, but the cooldowns of your non-animal form spells are increased to 2.5 times their normal length.
You now attack with tooth and claw using the stats of whatever weapon held in your right hand. Shields work normally but you cannot shield bash.
You are considered an animal. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and can now be healed normally by Positive energy spells, and you become immune to repair spells.
You cannot use wands or scrolls while in animal form.

Stance.Name: Plague Wolf
Stance.Description: You transform into a Plague Wolf gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Thorne Knight
Feat.Description:
Plant Form: You become a full Thorn Knight.
Gain +3 to caster level and max caster level of all Thorn and Poison spells.
10% Exceptional bonus to Armor Class and 100% Fortification.
You gain 10% Absorption against Piercing attacks and 5% Absorption against Bludgeon attacks.
You become 15% more Vulnerable to Fire and are now have immunity to most Sleep, Stun, Paralysis, Poison, and Mind-affecting spells and abilities.

Stance.Name: Thorne Knight
Stance.Description: You transform into Thorne Knight gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Hive Master
Feat.Description:
Swarm Form: You become one with the swarm.
Gain +3 to caster level and max caster level of all Acid and Posion spells.
Gain 50% Concealment and Improved Evasion.
Your reflex saves are increased by 1 every 2 Druid levels.
You are now ethereal to monsters when you tumble.
You become 15% more Vulnerable to Cold and are Immune to Mind effects and Knock down.

Stance.Name: Hive Master
Stance.Description: You transform into Hive Master gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: Wild Shape: Blighted Wolf
Feat.Description:
Animal Form: Transform into a Blighted Wolf. While in this form, you gain a +10% Combat Style bonus to attack speed, 15% bonus to movement speed, and a 10% Profane bonus to Max Hit Points and +1 Imbue Dice. You suffer a -2 penalty to Intelligence and Charisma and take 15% more damage from fire. While in Blighted Wolf form you gain access to a number of spells and enhancements that require Wolf form, but the cooldowns of your non-animal form spells are increased to 2.5 times their normal length.
You now attack with tooth and claw using the stats of whatever weapon held in your right hand. Shields work normally but you cannot shield bash.
Filled with blight you are considered a plant, gaining 100% Fortification, immunity to stun, mind effects and drwoning. If you are a Warforged, you are no longer considered a Living Construct, and can now be healed normally by positive energy spells, and you become immune to repair spells.
You cannot use wands or scrolls while in animal form.

Stance.Name: Blighted Wolf
Stance.Description: You transform into a Blighted Wolf gaining animal specific abilities

Feat.Name: True Patron: Fiend
Feat.Description:
You have made a pact with a fiend from the lower planes of existence, a being whose aims are evil, even if you strive against those aims. Such beings desire the corruption or destruction of all things, ultimately including you.
Pact Toggle: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses).

Stance.Name: Eldritch Blasting
Stance.Description: Pact Toggle: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses).

DC.Name: True Patron: Fiend
DC.Description: Pact Toggle: Your eldritch Blast deals +1 Fire damage, plus 1d6 per bonus Pact Dice. This damage is halved on a successful Fortitude saving throw vs DC(19 + Charisma Mod + Evocation Bonuses).

Feat.Name: Fiendskin
Feat.Description: You gain +1 Fire resistance per Warlock level

Feat.Name: Lesser Pact Attunement
Feat.Description: You gain 2d8 Eldritch Blast base damage and 2d6 Eldritch Blast Pact Dice.

Feat.Name: Pact Attunement
Feat.Description: You gain 2d8 Eldritch Blast base damage and 2d6 Eldritch Blast Pact Dice.

Feat.Name: Greater Pact Attunement
Feat.Description: You gain 2d8 Eldritch Blast base damage and 2d6 Eldritch Blast Pact Dice.

Feat.Name: Ultimate Pact Attunement
Feat.Description: You gain 2d8 Eldritch Blast base damage and 2d6 Eldritch Blast Pact Dice.

Feat.Name: Aussircaex's Defiance
Feat.Description: Minor Draconic Aura: You have taken on a small aspect of Aussircaex, the frozen foe of Korthos, which is reflected in your leadership. You and allies close to you get a +2 Morale Bonus to Saving Throws. You may have only one Minor Draconic Aura.

Feat.Name: Nevalarich's Hunger
Feat.Description: Minor Draconic Aura: You have taken on a small aspect of Nevalarich, scourge of the Thunder Peaks, which is reflected in your leadership. You and allies close to you get a +2 Morale Bonus to Attack Rolls. You may have only one Minor Draconic Aura.

Feat.Name: Thraxata's Instinct
Feat.Description: Minor Draconic Aura: You have taken on a small aspect of Thraxata, scourge of the Thunder Peaks, which is reflected in your leadership. You and allies close to you get a +2 Morale Bonus to Tactical Feat DCs. You may have only one Minor Draconic Aura.

Feat.Name: Velah's Fury
Feat.Description: Major Draconic Aura: You have taken on a significant aspect of Vela, invader of the Vault of Night. You and allies close to you get a +3 Morale Bonus to Damage Rolls. You may have only one Major Draconic Aura, which stacks with your Minor Draconic Aura.

Feat.Name: Sinvala's Toughness
Feat.Description: Major Draconic Aura: You have taken on a significant aspect of Sinvala the Vile. You and allies close to you get a +3 Morale Bonus to PRR. Rolls. You may have only one Major Draconic Aura, which stacks with your Minor Draconic Aura.

Feat.Name: Eternity's Ward
Feat.Description: Major Draconic Aura: You have taken on a significant aspect of Eternity, the Spectral Dragon of Night. You and allies close to you get a +3 Morale Bonus to MRR. Rolls. You may have only one Major Draconic Aura, which stacks with your Minor Draconic Aura.

Feat.Name: The Truthful One's Might
Feat.Description: Major Draconic Aura: You have taken on a powerful aspect of The Truthful One, the ancient betrayer. You and allies close to you get a +4 Morale Bonus to Melee Power. You may have only one Superior Draconic Aura, which stacks with your Minor and Major Draconic Auras.

Feat.Name: Aurgloroasa's Ascendend Wrath
Feat.Description: Major Draconic Aura: You have taken on a powerful aspect of Aurgloroasa, the Sibilant Shade. You and allies close to you get a +4 Morale Bonus to Ranged Power. You may have only one Superior Draconic Aura, which stacks with your Minor and Major Draconic Auras.

Feat.Name: Kor Kaza's Forbidden Power
Feat.Description: Major Draconic Aura: You have taken on a powerful aspect of Kor Kaza, scholar and temporal ravager. You and allies close to you get a +4 Morale Bonus to Universal Spell Power. You may have only one Superior Draconic Aura, which stacks with your Minor and Major Draconic Auras.
